question: Ttiimu y’eby’enjigiriza mu kibiina ky’abaana abato etegeketege okunyweza okusiima enjawulo okusinziira ku kiruubirirwa kino ekikulu mu kumanya obutonde bw’eby’embeera z’abantu n’ennono: “Okutegeera ebikulu ebyabaddewo mu byafaayo byabwe bo ku bwabwe n’eby’amaka gaabwe, mu mbeera ezitali zimu.” Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’erina engeri gy’ekwatagana n’ekiruubirirwa ekyo?
answer_a: Kukola ngabulo ku buli maka g'omwana, ng'oyanjula abantu baamu.
answer_b: Teekamu ebintu ebikozesebwa mu maka omuli ebikozesebwa mu kufumba n’ebintu omuterekebwa ebintu abaana bye bakozesa mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
answer_c: Tegeka ebifo by'okukolera omulimu omwana gy'akiikirira ebintu eby'enjawulo by'akola n'ab'omu maka ge.
answer_d: Muteeketeeke akadde k'omukolo ogw'ekibiina omwana yenna lw'ayogera ku mulimu gw'omuntu omu mu famire yaabwe.

question: Okusinziira ku kigendererwa kino: "Soma pulaani ennyangu ez'ebitundu by'obulamu bwo, ng'okozesa ebifo eby'enjawulo n'ebika by'ebifo ebiraga obunene bwabyo," bikorwa ki ebisaana okukozesebwa okukekeera omwana mu mwaka ogw'okubiri?
answer_a: Loba ekiifananyi ekiraga enteekateeka y'ekisenge ky'eklassi.
answer_b: Tegeera amakulu g'obubonero obuli ku pulaani y'ekibuga
answer_c: Lambulula ebifo we bisangibwa ku maapu eno.
answer_d: Okakasa endagiriro z'obubonero obuweereddwa ku katimba.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’omunaana, ku nkomerero y’essomo, agenda kukebera obusobozi bw’abayizi be okusunsula ensibuko z’ebyamawulire, ng’asinziira ku bwesigwa bwazo. Okukola kino, ategeka akatabo akamuyamba era akoze n’ebipimo bino: 1. Balaga omuntu eyawandiise ebyo. 2. Bannyonnyola mu bufunze gye byaggyiddwa oba embeera ebyo we byaggyiddwa. Mu bipimo bino ebiri wammanga, ekirala kiki ekikwatagana n’ebyo era ekigya kuyamba okumaliriza akatabo kano?
answer_a: Balaga ekika ky'ensibuko y'ebyo bye bakozesezza.
answer_b: Bakaayana ku makulu g'ebyawandiikiddwa.
answer_c: Bategeera ekyo ekigendererwa ekiri mu nsibuko y'ebyo bye basoma.
answer_d: Bakebera obutuufu bw'ebyo ebiri mu ssaabu y'ebyanjuliziddwa.

question:
Soma embeera eno:
Mu mutendera ogw’okuna ogw’ekisomesebwa kya Basic History, omusomesa asaba abayizi be okugeraageranya obuwangwa bwa Maya, Aztec, ne Inca era balage obufaananyi busatu obuliyo wakati waabyo. Emu ku nnyanukula ze yalabye yalaze bino wammanga:
“Bonna baali balimi, era newankubadde baalina ebibinja by’abantu eby’enjawulo, bonna baali baavu olw’okuba tebaalina tekinologiya nga ffe era nga babeera mu mayumba amayinja agaali amannyogovu ennyo.”
Nsobi ki eyolekedde mu nnyanukula y’omuyizi?
answer_a: Temutegeera muwendo gwa byabuwangwa by'Abamerika ogw'omunda
answer_b: Okusalira emisango egy’obuntu ku ntabaganya z’abamerika ez’edda nga okusinziira ku ndowooza z’omulembe guno
answer_c: Tassa kussaamu maanyi ku byafaayo by'ebyafaayo by'enzikiriza z'Abamerika ku nnono y'embeera z'obuwangwa ez'omulembe guno
answer_d: Abuzaabuza ebintu eby'enjawulo ebikulu eby'obuwangwa bw'eggwanga lya Amerika obumu n'ebyo eby'obuwangwa obulala.

question: Soma embeera eno: Oluvannyuma lw’okunnyonnyola abayizi obukulu bw’okujjukira mu bulamu bw’abantu, omusomesa ateekawo ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga eky’okutegeka ebintu ebikola okujjukira. Olw’ekigendererwa kino, omulimu gw’okunoonyereza ku mutwe guno gusseewo, okukolebwa mu kiseera ky’ekibiina okumala essaawa bbiri, mu bibiri bibiri, mu kisenge ky’ekkompyuta. Omulimu gw’ekibiina: 1. Zuula bintu ki ebikola okujjukira ebiyambako mu nkola y’okujjukira. 2. Kola ekiweebwa ekiraga engeri ebintu bino gye bitegekeddwamu okusinziira ku nkolagana yaabyo mu nkola, ng’oyawula buli kimu ku byo mu ngeri entangaavu. 3. Gamba ku kiweebwa kyo n’obunnyonnyofu, obumpi nga bwe kisoboka, okulambulula engeri okujjukira gye kwatondebwa. Ku ngeri zino wammanga, engeri ki eraga obulungi akabonero k’okukebera akafaanana n’omulimu omusomesa gwe yateese?
answer_a: Abayizi balambulula era boogera ku bitundu by’obwongo ebikuumira ebintu.
answer_b: Abayizi baawula ebitundu by’obwongo ebikola ku kukwatula ebintu n’okukebera enkolagana yaabyo.
answer_c: Abayizi balambulula ebitundu by’obwongo ebikola ku nzijukira era ne bakebera enkolagana yaabyo.
answer_d: Abayizi balambulula ebitundu by’obwongo ebikola ku kukwata ebirowoozo era bannyonnyola buli kimu ku byo.

question:
Soma embeera eno:
Ku ntandikwa y’essomo, omusomesa annyonnyola amakulu g’okumanyira ng’ayita mu nnyonnyola. Mu mbeera eno, omuyizi asaba okwongera okutangaaza ng’ayita mu kyokulabirako.
Mu bigambo bino ebiddirira, kiki ekikiikirira ekyokulabirako ekituufu okwongera okunnyonnyola amakulu g’okumanyira?
answer_a: Bwe tunaatera okussa omuyembe ku mukono gwaffe, gujja kufa oba okuziba era tetujja kuwulira buyenje ng’obunnyogovu.
answer_b: Ffeera ebiseera ebisinga tugula ssampu y’emu kubanga tumaze okugyemanyiira.
answer_c: Okulimba emirundi mingi, kireeta obuteesigangana mu balala.
answer_d: Singa emmotoka etadde ku luguudo evuga oluyimba lwayo olw’okutya buli kiro ku ssaawa munaana ez’ekiro, waliwo ekiseera we tunaalekera awo okufaayo.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Pulofeesa Estefanía akola ku bigambululo bya Pavlov ne Skinner. Omuyizi omu agamba nti yali abimanyi dda olw’okuba yali yabiraba mu firimu emu eyitibwa A Clockwork Orange. Omuyizi ayogera ku katundu omuntu omukulu mu firimu mw’akakibwa okulaba ebikolwa eby’ettemu ebitaliimu nsonga emirundi mingi ng’ate bamukuba omuti ogumuleetera obulumi mu mubiri okusobola okumujjanjaba. Amugamba nti mutuufu okukwataganya akatundu ako n’ebigambululo bye bayiga. Oluvannyuma, pulofeesa abuuza ekibuuzo kino: Akatundu kano koogeraako okakwataganya na bigambululo ki eby’empisa? Ku ngeri zino wammanga, engeri ki omuyizi gy’asaanidde okuddamu?
answer_a: Ndirowooza nti kwe kukendeeza ku mpisa embi olw'okutendeka, kubanga okuddamu okulaga ebikolwa eby'ettemu kiyamba okukendeeza ku mpisa y'omuntu omukulu ey'ettemu.
answer_b: Ndirowooza nti kwe kwegendereza okwa bulijjo kubanga ebiseera bya firimu ez'ettemu bireeta enkomerero y'empisa z'omuntu omukulu era kino kye kikolwa ekitegekeddwa.
answer_c: Mu mbeera eyo ndabamu okuyiga okw'ekimpowooza kubanga ebiseera bya firimu ez'ettemu bikwataganyizibwa n'obulumi bw'omuntu omukulu, bwatyo n'asobola okutereera.
answer_d: Mu mbeera eyo, engeri zombi ziriyo kubanga ebifaananyi eby'ettemu bikwataganyizibwa n'obulumi bw'omubiri. Kino kye kireetawo okubonerezebwa okukomya empisa z'omuntu omukulu.

question: Omusomesa ayanjula omulamwa gw'obwenzi era n'alaga nti obwenzi buba bwa maanyi, naye bumalawo ebbanga erilinga ekintu ekibuleetawo. Oluvannyuma, asaba abayizi okukola olukalala lw'obwenzi. Omuyizi omu agamba nti, okusinziira ku ekyo omusomesa ky'annyonnyodde, okwagala kye kimu ku bwenzi obulina okubaawo ku lukalala. Ku bigambo bino wammanga ebiwa omusomesa by'akozesa okukolola ekirowoozo ky'omuyizi?
answer_a: Omukwano kwe kukaluba okw'amaanyi nnyo nti ekintu ekukuleetera omukwano guno kibeerawo buli kiseera.
answer_b: Okubeera mu laavu bulijjo kwetaaga ekintu ekikuleetera okugibeeramu, kale nga n’ekyo kiba kimu ku birowoozo.
answer_c: Okubeera mu laavu tekufaanana ng’ekimu ku birowoozo, kubanga tekwetaaga kintu kireetawo embeera eyo.
answer_d: Okwagala tekwetaagisa kubaawo kintu ekukuleetera okukwagala, kale tekibeetaagisa kukutwala ng’ekimu ku birowoozo.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa annyonnyola abayizi be enjawulo wakati w’okukulaakulana kw’obuntu okusooka n’okwokubiri. Bw’amaze okubuuza abayizi be ku nsonga zino, akizuula nti tebategeeddwamu bulungi abayizi. Ku ngeri zino wammanga, y’eri eyinza okukozesebwa okwanguya okutegeera ensonga zombi?
answer_a: Mu kibiina ekiddako, asaba abayizi okukola olukalala lw’ebintu bye bayize okuva mu maka gaabwe nga tebannagenda mu kkindagaatoni n’olulala olw’ebyo bye bayize mu kkindagaatoni, essomero oba ebifo ebirala mwe babadde nga bali mu bulamu bwabwe. Oluvannyuma yeesomesa era n’ekebera enkalala ezo nabo.
answer_b: Mu ssomero eriddako, abasaba okukola olukalala lw’ebyo bye bajjukira bye bayize mu myaka etaano egyasooka egy’obutooto bwabwe n’olulala olw’ebyo bye balina okuva bwe bazaalibwa. Oluvannyuma, bombi, bakubaganya ebirowoozo, bakeetegereza, era baggyamu ensonga enkulu.
answer_c: Mu lusoma oluddako, asaba abayizi okukola olukalala lw’enjawulo eziriwo wakati w’okukula ng’omwana omu yekka n’okukula ng’olina baganda bo abalala. Oluvannyuma akubaganya nabo ebirowoozo ku lukalala luno era n’alwekenenya.
answer_d: Mu ssomero eriddako, asaba abayizi okunnyonnyola gye bava n’okwawula obulamu mu byalo n’obulamu mu bibuga. Oluvannyuma, bombi, bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku byo bye bannyonnyodde ne baggyamu ensonga enkulu okuzimba awamu endowooza.

question: Soma omusango guno: Omusomesa akola ku bigambululo ebigereke n'abayizi be abeesaliddwawo era abawa omusango guno: Ekigambululo ekisooka: Abaganzi abamu balungi empisa, Ekigambululo ekyokubiri: Abantu abamu abalungi empisa basajja bazira. Kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky'asaanidde okubuuza abayizi okusobola okugonjoola ekigambululo ekigereke mu ngeri entuufu?
answer_a: Sillogizimu erina ebigambo bisatu?
answer_b: Okugaziya kw'ekigambo ekiri wakati mu bigambululo kye ki?
answer_c: Waliwo okukontana kwonna wakati w'emiramu egiri mu bigambululo ebikulembera okutuuka ku nkongezo?
answer_d: Ddala waliwo ekikakafu ekikwatagana ku buli muntu yenna?

question: Soma endogologo eno eterekeddwa omuyizi omukulu mu siniya: Ekigendererwa ky’essomero ebya waggulu kwe kutuukirira. Omwaka gwa siniya gwe guba ekigendererwa ky’essomero ebya waggulu. Omwaka gwa siniya kwe kutuukirira. Ku ngeri zino wammanga, eruwa ekiraga ensobi omuyizi gy’akoze?
answer_a: Ennambuluzo erina ebigambo ebisukka mu bisatu.
answer_b: Ekigambululo ekikulu kirimu ekigambululo ekitono mu nnyingo yaakyo ey’amakulu agatuukirawo.
answer_c: Obunene mu kigambululo ekisooka businga obunene mu kigambululo ekyokubiri.
answer_d: Ensonga emu ku nsonga ezikozesebwa ntono, n’olwekyo omuliisa tegusobola kuba gwa bonna.

question:
Omusomesa ayinza kuddamu atya okutereeza ensobi eno mu ssomero ly'empisa?

Omuntu okuba omulungi oba omubi kiva ku bantu abamwetoolodde. Hobbes ne Rousseau boogera ku muntu nga bw'ali mu butonde bwe, si mu mbeera y'obuntu. Ekyo omuntu ky'afuuka nga amaze okukulaakulana mu bantu kiba kya njawulo ku muntu nga bw'ali mu butonde bwe.
answer_a: Embeera y'obutonde bwa buli muntu y'embeera ey'obuteebereza okunenya engeri Gavumenti gy'ezimbibwamu nga basinziira ku butonde bw'omuntu.
answer_b: Mu mbeera y'obutonde, wateekwa okubaawo abantu abalungi n'ababi okusobola okubaawo endagaano.
answer_c: Obulungi oba obubi bw'abantu buba mbeera nkulu ezibaawo nga endagaano y'omukago teginnaba kuteekebwa mu nkola.
answer_d: Embeera y'obutonde bwe mbeera ey'obuteebwa okusobola okunnyonnyola engeri obulungi oba obubi gye busalawo ekika kya gavumenti ekivaamu.

question: Soma omusango guno: Omusomesa asaba abayizi be okukwataganya endowooza za Plato ne Aristotle ku butuufu bw’ebintu nga bayita mu birowoozo oba endowooza. Enkyukakyuka ki eyogerwa abayizi eraga obulungi enjawulo wakati w’abawandiisi bano?
answer_a: Obulamu n'okufa
answer_b: Ensi n'olusozi lwa Katonda olw'Ekikristaayo
answer_c: Amazima n'obulimba
answer_d: Obusawo n'essomo ly'ebiramu

question: Mu kusoma ekitabo Essay Concerning Human Understanding ekyawandiikibwa John Locke, omusomesa ateesa okunoonyereza ku mulamwa gw'ebipimo ebiwulirwa eby'omulamwa gw'okumanya okwanguya okutegeera n'okunyweza okumanya kuno. Mu nkola zino wammanga, yipi esaanira okukozesebwa okukwataganya n'emiramwa emirala egyalabwa edda mu somo n'okukkiriza omuyizi okutegeera ebyo ebiri mu mulamwa guno?
answer_a: Saba omuyizi okuddamu okwekenneenya obwongo obukwata ku birowoozo ng’ekitundu ky’engeri obwongo gye bukola emirimu era abu zigatte ku ndowooza za Locke, ng’omugeraageranya ku birowoozo byombi ebikulu.
answer_b: Muwabule omuyizi okugeraageranya endowooza ya Locke n'endowooza ya Descartes ey'ebirowoozo ebijja butereevu ng'akozesa maapu y'endowooza.
answer_c: Lagira omuyizi okuddamu okwekenneenya endowooza z’okutegeera n’okulaba okuva mu by’endowooza (cognitive psychology) era abigeregeranye n’endowooza ya Locke, ng’akakasa ebifaanagana, ebyawukanira ddala, n’ebibuuzo.
answer_d: Mubuulire omuyizi okukola okugeraageranya wakati w’endowooza ya Aristotle ku bukulu bw’okumanya n’endowooza ya Locke esinziira ku njawulo ezisookerwako mu buli ndowooza.

question: Soma omusango guno: Omusomesa aleeta ebirowoozo bya Jean Paul Sartre ku ddembe ly'omuntu. Omuyizi ayingirawo okulaga nti kimuzibuwalira okutegeera ekirowoozo ky'omuwandiisi nti tewali muntu wa butonde. Mu nnyanukula zino wammanga eziyinza okuyamba omuyizi okutegeera ekirowoozo kya Sartre?
answer_a: Obutafaanana ng’abantu, ebintu ebyakolebwa omuntu, omukozi ng’eky’okulabirako, tebisobola kuba na ntandikwa nga tebinnaba kubaawo ng’omukozi abikola.
answer_b: Okufaanana n'abantu, ebintu ebyakolebwa omuntu, ng'omukozi w'emikono, bisobola okuba n'obuntu obwateekebwawo, naye era, okusobola okubaawo, biteekwa okubaawo.
answer_c: Ffe abantu tetwatondebwawo muntu yenna, kale nno tewali mutindo oba ngeri ya buntu ebibaddeewo nga tetunnaba kukozesa oba okutuukiriza eddembe ly’okukola bye twagala.
answer_d: Abantu baatondebwawo omuntu eyatuwa eddembe ery’okukola (obuyinza okwesalirawo); n’olwekyo, tukola ekyo kye tubeera nga tusinziira ku bikolwa byaffe.

question:
Lowooza ku mbeera eno:
Mu kibiina ky'abayizi abasoma 'Emisingi gy'Empisa', omusomesa annyonnyola ku mulamwa gw'okwenenya okusinziira ku Jean Paul Sartre. Bw'abuuzizza abayizi be ekyokulabirako ku mulamwa guno, omu ku bo addamu nti "okwenenya kwe kumala gabu muntu kw'alina olw'okuba nga abadde n'omukisa omubi mu by'omukwano."
Nsobi ki eri mu kyokulabirako omuyizi ky'awadde?
answer_a: Kikyamu okugattika obwennyamivu obw’obulamu n’enkola z’embeera z’abantu, kubanga enkolagana n’abalala yombi yanguya era ezibuza okutuukiriza ekyo omuntu ky’ayagala okubeera.
answer_b: Tekituufu okukendeeza obuyinike obw’obulamu okubuggya ku ndwadde y’obwongo; okunnyonnyola kuno kulemesa okumanya ng’ekintu ekiriwo.
answer_c: Kizibu okukwataganya endowooza y’ennaku y’obulamu n’embeera z’omutima, kubanga teytegeera nkolagana ya nnaku n’okumanya obuvunaanyizibwa.
answer_d: Kikyamu okukwataganya obuyinike obw’obulamu n’obubonero bw’okwennyamira, kubanga okulemererwa mu laavu kusobola okuleetawo okwekulaakulanya mu ddembe ly’omuntu.

question: Soma omusango guno: Omusomesa annyonnyola omulamwa gwa Nietzsche ku ntandikwa y'empisa, ogunnyonnyolwa mu 'Ku Nsibo y'Empisa'. Omuyizi agamba nti awagira ebirowoozo by'omuwandiisi kubanga awolereza empisa z'abanywevu, eziwakanya ezo z'abalemwa. Mu ndagaano zino wammanga, lwaki ensobi ekwekuddwa mu bigambo by'omuyizi ennyonnyolwa?
answer_a: Omuyizi alinga agatta empisa z'abakungu ku ddembe ly'okukola, ng'asuulawo ebiriva mu bikolwa ebyo.
answer_b: Omuyizi alowooza nti empisa enzikiriza obutabaawo bwa Katonda zirina okuwangulwa abanafu okutuuka ku muntu ow’amaanyi (overman).
answer_c: Omuyizi atabukiriza okuddamu okwekenneenya empisa z'abanafu n'okuvaayo kw'ebimu ku mbeera z'obuntu.
answer_d: Omuyizi atabukiriza enkyukakyuka y'omuwendo n'okweyoleka kw'obuntu obw'amaanyi.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu mutera gw'ekitabo "Empula z'abantu abaaliko mu Amerika nga Columbus tannajja", omusomesa, bw'aba ng'annyonnyola ebintu ebikulu ebyali bigendererwa mu nkola y'ebyenfuna ey'Abainca, akiraba nti ekibinja ky'abayizi be tekyetegeera kigambo "enkola y'ebyenfuna ey'okugabirira". Awo asalawo okuddamu okunnyonnyola amakulu g'ekigambo ekyo, naye ku mulundi guno ng'akozesa olugero olufaananyi. Ku lugero olufaananyi olulondoolwa wano, lulina akakwate akasinga obulungi ku nkola y'ebyenfuna ey'okugabirira?
answer_a: Ekitundu ky’eggombolola kyazzaayo ssente ezisasulwa omwaka oguwedde olw’okukungaanya kasasiro eri abakadde baamu.
answer_b: Olutalo lw'okunoonya ssente olwa Telethon lwatongozza kampeyini empya okukunganya ssente ezisinga omwaka oguwedde era n'okuzimba nazo eddwaliro eddala erijjanjabira abalwadde abazzeemu obulemu.
answer_c: ONEMI yakozesa obuyambi bwa Gavumenti obwali buteereddwawo okukola ku buzibu obwava mu katyabaga n'okuddamu okuzimba ekitundu ekyakosebwa amataba.
answer_d: Ekitongole kya Hogar de Cristo kyakkendeereza ku bbeeyi y'amayumba gaabwe ag'obuyambi eri abantu abetaaga.

question: Mu kitundu "Ekiva mu kulwanyisa n'okuwamba," omusomesa ow'ekitongole eky'okutaano ayagala okukebera oba abayizi be bategeera ebyava mu kulwanyisa n'okuwamba ku bantu b'omu America abazaliranwa. Okukola kino, yakola akakodyo k'okukebera bye bayize. Ku biragiro bino eby'obuwanguzi omusomesa bye yakola, kiruwa ekiraga ekigendererwa ekiddwamu?
answer_b: Okusinziira ku mmeeza z'ebaluule, malaamuzi embeera z'abantu bwe yali mu kiseera ky'okuwamba.
answer_c: Sinziira ku byafaayo, zuula ebintu ebyaleetawo okukendeera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu.
answer_d: Okusinziira ku bujjalikidi obw’ebifaananyi, londa enjawulo eziriwo wakati w’okulwanagana kw’abantu ab’enzalwa n’abantu abaabawamba.

question:
Soma ku biwandiike bino:
[...]Ekibiina ky'abaana kisoma ebiwandiike ebikwata ku kibiina ky'abantu ab'enzaliranwa (aba diaguitas) abakola ebintu eby'obubumba. Ebiwandiike biriko ekifaananyi ekiraga abakazi nga basa omutere mu kinu, n'ebibya eby'obubumba okumpi nabo.
Omusomesa asembereza ekibiina era omu ku baana agamba:
-“Abantu bano ab'enzaliranwa baakola ebintu eby'emikono eby'obubumba.” “Bintu ki bye baakozesanga ebikozesebwa bino?” omusomesa abuuza.
-“Okulabisa amayumba,” omwana akakasa.
-Omusomesa atunuulira ekifaananyi era n'akakasa: “Lwaki olowooza nti baakozesanga ebintu ebyo ng'ebirabisa?”
-“Eyo y'ensonga lwaki maama wange abigula.”
-Era omwana omulala agattako: “Yee, maama wange naye ayagala ebintu eby'emikono. Tulina bingi eka.” [..]
Aisenberg, Beatriz (okukyusa)
Buzibu ki mu kutegeera obudde obw'ebyafaayo obulagibwa mu mbeera ennyonnyoddwa?
answer_a: Obuzibu obuli mu kutegeera obubonero bw'ensibuko y'ebyafaayo mu bintu ebya bulijjo
answer_b: Omutindo gw’okuwa ebintu n’embeera amakulu nga tusinziira ku mbeera ez’omulembe guno.
answer_c: Obuzibu obuli mu kusigala nga tuli bwesigwa eri ebintu ebyolesebwa eby'obuyiiya ng'ebikozesebwa okuzuula ebintu eby'edda
answer_d: Omutindo gw’okukola enkwatira ku mbeera ezirimu ebintu ebifaananagana oba ebyeyongerayo.

question: Mu kitundu "Enkola y'Okununula Eggwanga," omusomesa akubirizza abayizi be ab'omu mwaka ogw'omunaana okukozesa obubaka obw'enjawulo basobole okwawulawo ensibuko ennyonnyola enkulakulana y'enkola eno. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekinaasobozesa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateekebwawo mu kibiina?
answer_a: Okusinziira ku Ssemateeka wa Spain eya 1812, nkyukakyuka ki ezaava mu kuwona kwa Kabaka Ferdinand VII?
answer_b: Yiga endowooza z'Abakuleeyezi ku bikwata ku kutondebwa kw'Akakiiko Akakulu aka Cádiz
answer_c: Mu biwandiiko by'obulamu bw'abakulembeze b'ameefuga, zuulula ebintu eby'enjawulo ebyakola enteekateeka y'okufuna ameefuga.
answer_d: Mu bigambo by’abakulembeze b’ekibiina ekisooka ekyafuzi eggwanga, zuula emisingi gy’ebyobufuzi egyawagira enkola eyo.

question: Abayizi abali mu mwaka ogwomunaana babuuza ekibuuzo kino ku mutwe "Enkyukakyuka mu Makolero": Lwaki omutwe guyitibwa Enkyukakyuka mu Makolero so nga tetulabangako ntalo oba okwekubagiza okusobola okutuukiriza erinnya lyagwo? Okugaziya okutegeera okukalu okw'omuyizi kuno ku nkola y'ebyafaayo, ndowooza ki endala eyandigenze mu maaso okutunulwa mu nnyingo eno?
answer_a: Okutangaaza ku by'obukolero nga tukozesa engeri ey'obunnabutonde obw'ensonga ennyingi.
answer_b: Nyigiriza engeri y’amakolero gye gakulakulana ng’ebintu ebigattikaanye era nga byekolera byokka.
answer_c: Tegeeza ebiseera Enkyukakyuka y’amakolero mwe yatandikira.
answer_d: Kubiriza okwekenneenya ennyingo ezikwata ku mbeera y'abakozi mu makolero.

question: Omusomesa akolera wamu n'abayizi be ab'ekibiina eky'omukaaga ku kiruubirirwa kino: okumanya ebifaayo by'ebitundu by'eggwanga eby'ebyobufuzi n'obukulembeze. N'olwekyo, asalawo okugatta omutwe guno ku mawulire gano agakwata ku kutondebwawo kw'essaza lya Ñuble n'okukola okunoonyereza ku nsibuko y'amawulire: Olukiiko lw'abakulembeze lukkirizza okutondebwawo kw'Essaza lya XVI erya Ñuble. Enteekateeka eno, kati etegekeddwa okulangirirwa, era etondawo amasaza amapya asatu. Chile egenda kuba n'essaza lyayo erye kkumi na mukaaga. Kino kyasaliddwawo Olukiiko lw'abakulembeze ku Lwakusatu luno oluvannyuma lw'okukkiriza n'obululu 26 obuwagira, bubiri obuwakanya, n'obutaalina n'omu ataalonze mu nkola yaabwe ey'okusatu omuteeko ogutondawo Essaza lya Ñuble eripya. Enteekateeka eno, kati etegekeddwa okulangirirwa, era egenda kutondawo amasaza amapya asatu: Diguillín (Chillán, Chillán Viejo, Quillón, Bulnes, San Ignacio, El Carmen, Pinto, Pemuco, ne Yungay), Punilla (San Carlos, Ñiquén, Coihueco, San Fabián, ne San Nicolás), ne Itata (Quirihue, Cobquecura, Ninhue, Treguaco, Coelemu, Portezuelo, ne Ránquil). Kika kya mawulire ki omuyizi ky'ayinza okuggya mu mawulire ago agakwata ku nteekateeka y'ebyobufuzi n'obukulembeze bwa Chile?
answer_a: Ebisaanyizo eby'obukugu eby'okukozesa okutondawo eggwanga
answer_b: Enkola y'ebifo eby'enjawulo mu kitundu ng'ekifo ekifugibwa.
answer_c: Ensonga ezisobozesa okukyusa ekitundu okukifuula eky’obuwangaazi
answer_d: Obukulembeze bw'ekitundu nga bwe butondekeddwaawo mu by'obufuzi.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya asobola okukozesa omulimu gw'okunnyonnyola emisingi gy'obukyewa n'engeri gye gyakozesebwa mu ggwanga ery'ekyokulabirako mu kyasa ekya 19, era ng'omulimu ogusooka, asaba abayizi okukola amakulu g'obukyewa. Abayizi bwe bamala okugabana bye bakoze, omusomesa agenda kwolesa omulimu ogw'okubiri ogugendereddwamu okugumya amakulu gano. Ku mirimu egiddako, gwaki omusomesa gw'ayinza okukozesa okukulaakulanya ekifo kino eky'okubiri eky'okuyiga?
answer_a: Wandika obulamu bw’omuntu eyali omukulembeze ow’ekibiina kya Liberal mu ggwanga ery’ekyokulabirako mu kyasa ekya 19.
answer_b: Enjawulo eriwo wakati mu mulamwa abayizi gwe bannyonnyodde n'emisingi gy'obulyake egiriwo mu kiseera ekyo
answer_c: Teekawo akakadde akalaga engeri endowooza y'obulyake bw'atondekeka mu mitendera egy'enjawulo.
answer_d: Kebera ensibuko y'ebyafaayo okuzuula emisingi gy'obulyake egirimu.

question: Ng’omukugu mu by’enfuna mu Chile oluvannyuma lw’ekyeya kya 1929, omusomesa yatandise essomo ng’abuuza abayizi be: “Endwadde y’omwaka gwa 1929 yakolebwako etya mu Chile?” Okusinziira ku by’addamu, yakiraba nti abayizi baali balowooza nti enkola y’okukola ebintu mu ggwanga (ISI) ye yali eddembe eri endwadde eyo. N’olwekyo, okukyusa endowooza eyo, yabagabira ekiwandiiko kino basobole okukyekenneenya: Okusinziira ku biwandiiko ebyaweebwa Gabriel Palma, newankubadde ng’omwaka gwa 1935, eby’obugagga eby’omu ttaka – naddala nitrate – byali tebinnadda ku mutindo gwe byaliko mu 1929, omuwendo gwa nitrate gwali gweyongedde okuva ku toni 694,000 mu 1932 okutuuka ku toni 1,200,000 mu 1935; mu kiseera kye kimu, omuwendo gwa copper enongoosefu ne blister gweyongeddeko ebitundu 270 ku buli 100. Mu ngeri enjawulo, newankubadde ng’eby’obulimi byali byamaze okudda ku mutindo gwe byaliko mu 1929 mu mwaka gwa 1933, byaddirira oluvannyuma [...]. Bwe gwali guweddeko omwaka gwa 1932, abakozi abaali tebalina mirimu baali 129,000, omuwendo gwakka okutuuka ku 69,000 ku nkomerero y’omwaka gwa 1933, okutuuka ku 28,000 ku nkomerero y’omwaka gwa 1934, okutuuka ku 8,000 omwaka ogwaddirira, n’okutuuka ku batakka ku 5,000 mu 1936. Ebyafaayo bya Chile mu kyasa ekya 20, Correa, S. Ndowooza ki ey’abayizi omusomesa gy’agezaako okukyusa ng’ayita mu kwekenneenya ekiwandiiko ekiri waggulu?
answer_a: Okulowooza nti okuddaabiriza ebyenfuna kwatandika n'okutondebwawo kwa CORFO.
answer_b: Okuteebereza nti CORFO yatumbula enkola ey’omulembe ey’eby’obusuubuzi bw’ekikomo mu Chile.
answer_c: Okutegeera nti ekigendererwa kya CORFO kyali kyakuggyawo ebintu ebibi ebyali biva mu makolero agakola ebintu ebirimu oluwombo lwa nayituleeti.
answer_d: Okukkiriza nti olw’okutondebwawo kwa CORFO, eggwanga lya Chile lyalekeraawo okwesigama ku byenfuna by’amawanga amalala.

question: Kibaluwa ki ey’obufuzi abayizi abali mu S.2 gye balina okusooka okumanya nga tebannatandika kwogera ku nkola y’obufuzi ey’ekiddugavu?
answer_b: Okutaputaputa mu by'obufuzi
answer_c: Okugabanya obuyinza bw'eggwanga
answer_d: Okutumbula omukulembeze alina obusobozi obw'enjawulo

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka okukebera omutwe 'Ensibuko y'enfuga ez'enjawulo ez'ebyobufuzi n'ebyenfuna mu kyasa ekya 20,' era ekimu ku bigendererwa by'okuyiga ekyetaaga okukeberebwa kwe kwawula engeri y'obufuzi bw'ekinnazi obw'ekikaba ennyo ku bw'Abasovieti. Ku nsonga eno, ebiraga by'okukebera bino bitegekeddwa: 1.- Ategeera embeera y'ebyafaayo mwe mwavumbululwa obufuzi bw'ekikaba ennyo. 2.- Awula omuwendo ogwateekebwa ku ttaka. 3.- Akimanya nti propaganda ey'ebyobufuzi yakozesebwa mu ngeri ey'obulimba. 4.- Akimanya omulimu ogwateekebwa ku ggwanga ng'omuzannyi mu by'embeera z'abantu. Biri ku biraga bino ebiyinza okukozesebwa okukebera ekigendererwa ky'okuyiga ekitegekeddwa?
answer_a: 1 ne 2
answer_b: 1 ne 3
answer_c: 2 ne 4
answer_d:
3. Gamba engeri ebintu bisatu gye bikozesebwa okukendeeza ku busagwa mu maka.
4. Laga enjawulo wakati w'ekigambululo n'ekibuuzo.

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka okukola okukebera okw’ekiseera n’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogusooka mu siniya okugera ekituukiriddwa ku kiruubirirwa ky’okwekenneenya engeri obuwangwa bwe bukosebwa obutonde bw’ensi yonna okusinziira ku bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Ku mirimu egiddannyuma gino egy’okukebera, bayizi ki gye basaanye okukola?
answer_a: Empaka z'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bintu ebyava mu kutabaganya ensi yonna ku kibuga mwe babeera
answer_b: Okukungaanya ebirowoozo okuteeka enkola y'okutabaganya ensi yonna mu mbeera y'ebiseera.
answer_c: Omuzannyo ogw'okuzannya ogukwata ku bukulu bw'okuyiiya ebipya mu tekinologiya mu by'empuliziganya
answer_d: Omwoleso ku nkola y’okutwalira amateeka g’amawanga amalala mu maka gaabwe emyaka egiyise.

question: Ku ntandikwa y’essomo eririna omutwe ‘Okusoomoozebwa kw’Ensi Yonna eri Ebitundu’, omusomesa asalawo okuleeta amawulire gano eri abayizi be okusobola okumanya oba bategeera ebimu ku birowoozo ebikulu ebiri mu mutwe gw’essomo: - Ekkopa eyambuka n’etuuka ku $2.71 buli pawundi olw’okukulaakulana okutasuubirwa mu China. - Omuwendo gw’eby’ennyanja ebitundwa mu Chile gweyongera ne gulinnya ku 12% mu myezi esatu egyasooka olw’obwetaavu bwabyo mu Asiya. - Ebyenfuna by’omwenge ogukolebwa mu Chile bitenderezebwa ensi yonna: Gwe gusinga obulungi? - Eby’obulimi bw’ebibira n’okutondawo emirimu. Emirimu egisukka mu 300,000 olw’okwongera ku bintu ebifulumizibwa ebweru w’eggwanga. Mu birowoozo bino ebiri wammanga, biruwa abayizi bye bateekwa okumanya okusobola okutegeera amakulu g’emitwe gy’amawulire gino?
answer_a: Obutonde bw’ensi yonna okufuuka ekintu kimu
answer_b: Omutendera gw'ebyenfuna
answer_c: Obutonde bw’ensi obugunjufu
answer_d: Okukwatagana kw'ebyenfuna

question: Mu mutera gw'ekitabo 'Okukozesa obutuuze n'enkola z'obukiise obwa politika', omusomesa ow'omwaka ogw'okuna awa abayizi be ensibuko eno era n'abawa eddakiika ntono okugisoma kinnoomu: Mu 2011, etteeka 20500 lyateekebwa mu nkola, erikkiriza okutondawo Obukiiko bw'Ebifo by'Abantu (COSOC), obulina obuwabuzi era busobola okuyamba okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'okukozesa amaanyi ku nkola, entekateeka, n'okwekenneenya kwa politika z'omu kitundu, ez'ebitongole bya gavumenti n'obukulembeze bw'ekibuga. Bano bateekwa okusisinkana emirundi ena mu mwaka. [Obuwandiisi obw'ekyama obw'Enkulakulana y'Obutundu n'Obukulembeze (Okukyusa)]. Kiri ku bigendererwa by'okuyiga bino wammanga ekisobola okutuukibwako n'ensibuko eyo waggulu?
answer_a: Londawo abantu benyigira mu bintu ebibakwatako ng'abantu b'eggwanga.
answer_b: Nnyonnyola omusingi gw'obukiikirizi mu by'obufuzi.
answer_c: Tegera amakulu g'ebitongole ebifuzi eby'ebitundu.
answer_d: Nnyonnyola enkola y’okugabanya obuyinza obw’ebyobufuzi n’obukulembeze.

question: Soma embeera y'omu ক্লাসিকের mu maaso: Omukyala Pérez, omusomesa w'Olungereza, atandika essomo eripya. Awandiika "Vacation" ku lubaawo era n'akwata ekifaananyi ky'olulango lw'okuwummula. Asaba abayizi be okutunula ku mutwe gw'essomo era n'ekifaananyi nga bagabana ebirowoozo ku kye essomo linaaba likwata. Oluvannyuma, abasaba okwawula engeri z'okuwummula ezitali zimu eziragiddwa mu lulango era n'abawa emirimu egisingawo ku buli emu. Okumaliriza ebimanyiddwa, omusomesa abawa ebintu ebikwata ku nkambi z'okuwummula ez'abavubuka mu Amerika ng'ababuza oba balina ekintu ekifaanana bwe kityo mu nsi yaabwe. Bwe bamaliriza, agamba nti bagenda kuwuliriza okwogera kw'amaka agalonda we bagenda okuwummulira omulundi oguddako. Oluvannyuma, asaba okuteebereza bigambo ki n'embeera ki ebyogeddwa edda bye balowooza nti banaawulira mu kwogera. Ku nkomerero, Omukyala Pérez n'abayizi be bawuliriza okwogera era ne bakebera ebirowoozo byabwe. Musomesa akola ki mu mbeera y'omu ক্লাসিকের mu maaso?
answer_a: Annyonnyola omutwe gw'essomo.
answer_b: Akola emirimu gy'akamwa mu kibiina okusobozesa abayizi okulowooza ku mutwe gw'essomo.
answer_c: Muwala akozesa enkola z'okuwuliriza okusobola okuteeka omulamwa gw'ekiwandiiko mu mbeera entuufu n'okukubiriza abayizi.
answer_d: Akakozesa ebintu ebya bulijjo okusobola abayizi okukwataganya omutwe gw'ekigambo n'obulamu bwabwe era n'okuwa endowooza zaabwe.

question: Lwaki eggulobu kintu kya mugaso nga kikozesebwa okuyigiriza?
answer_a: Kubanga kiyamba okwetegereza enkula y’Ensi nga bw’eri mu butuufu.
answer_b: Kubanga kiyamba okutegeera obutundu bw’ensi bwonna mu kiseera kye kimu
answer_c: Kubanga kiyamba okusoma obugazi bw’ensi mu bujjuvu.
answer_d: Kubanga kiyamba okusobola okuzuula buli kifo ku Nsi mu butuufu.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okubiri mu pulayimale yalaze abayizi be maapu eraga ebitundu bya Chile eby’omu Bukiikakkono, wakati, n’obukiikaddyo. Oluvannyuma, yabalese n’ebifo ebirabika mu bitundu bino era n’abasuubira okukuba ekkolaasi mu langi emmyufu ku bifo ebirabika eby’omu bukiikakkono; mu kiragala, eby’omu makkati; ne mu kiddugavu, eby’omu bukiikaddyo. Omulimu guno gusinga kwesigamizibwa ku kirubirirwa ki ku bino ebiwandiikiddwa wammanga?
answer_a: Londa ebifo eby'obutonde okusinziira ku bitundu by'ensi.
answer_b: Gerageranya ebitundu by’ensi okusinziira ku ndabika yaabyo.
answer_c: Laga obubonero bw'ebitundu by'ensi obutali bumu.
answer_d: Londa ebifo okusinziira ku bitundu by’ensi gye birimu.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omusomesa akola emirimu egigendereddwamu okusobozesa abayizi okunyonyola enkolagana wakati w’Abamapuche n’Abasipanya mu biseera by’amatwale. Okutuukiriza kino, akola omulimu ogusooka ogwesigamiziddwa ku kiwandiiko kino: Mu lukiiko olwatwalibwa e Paicaví mu 1605, kyassalwawo nti abantu ababeera ku nsalo baalina okusasula omusolo ogw’ekigero mu bintu, okuweereza omuntu nga tekikkirizibwa. Bwe bandibadde bawaayo abantu okukolera ku ttaka ly’Abasipanya, bandisasuddwa mu feeza oba ebintu ebifaanana feeza. Ate era, baalina okugenda mu lutalo okulwanyisa abalabe b’Omwami. Abayindi baddamu nga bamatidde nti bandisigadde mu mirembe, "[...] kubanga Obwami bwe bwali butunuddemu ensonga enkulu ey’obujeemu bwabwe n’eddagala lyabwo, nga kwe kuweereza omuntu kwe baajeemera [...]". Kirabika, nti mu myaka egyo Abayindi abaali ab’omukwano baakyavanga mu kitundu ky’Abayindi ab’omu encomienda. Baatandika, okukola obukodyo ku mbeera yaabwe ennyini – okutunuulira ekyaaliwo emyaka egiyise-, kubanga tebakyali Bayindi abaagendanga mu lutalo n’abakama baabwe ab’omu bitundu bya wakati mu ggwanga, wabula Bayindi ab’omu encomienda okuva mu kitundu kye kimu ekirimu obutakkaanya. Ku luuyi olulala, embeera yaabwe yali gezeezeddwa okugiwewula nga bakugira okuweereza omuntu, ensonga enkulu ey’obutali bumativu bwabwe. Abayindi ab’omukwano ku nsalo ya Araucanian, (Andrea Ruiz-Esquide). Nga kisinziira ku kiwandiiko ekiri waggulu, mulimu ki ogukebera oba abayizi bategeera enkolagana wakati w’Abamapuche n’Abasipanya mu biseera by’amatwale?
answer_a: Bakola pposita erimu kubuukanya ekigendererwa ky'endagaano ya Paicaví.
answer_b: Bagattira mu bufunze okuva mu lukalala endagaano enkulu wakati w'Abamapuche n'Abasipanya.
answer_c: Balinnyisa ebika byonna eby’enkolagana wakati w’Abasipanya ne Mapuche era okole akakaadi akalaga buli kimu.
answer_d: Balaga Palamenti ya Paicaví era boogera ku ngeri ensalo wakati w’ebibiina byombi gye yakyukaamu okumala ebbanga.

question:
Soma embeera eno:
Ku nkomerero y’essomo eriri ku “Ebyafaayo by’e Athens,” ekimu ku bigendererwa omusomesa bye yali ayagala okukebera kwe kutegeera engeri entongole demokulasiya y’e Athens gye yali efaanana, era okukebera obungi bw’ebyo abaana be baali bamaze okuyiga, yabagambye okukola akatabo akalaga enjawulo wakati wa demokulasiya y’e Athens ne demokulasiya y’e Chile ey’omulembe guno. Okusobola okukebera ebyo bye baali bamuddizza, yateekateeka akatabo akasinziira ku bintu ebyakuumiddwa okuva edda n’ebyo ebitakyakuumiddwa.
Mu biraga ebina ebikozesebwa okukebera ebiri wammanga, kiki ekiraga nti omuyizi ategedde enkyukakyuka eriwo wakati wa demokulasiya zombi?
answer_a: Kiraga obukulu bw’ekitongole mu nteekateeka y’emirimu
answer_b: Ategeera enjawulo mu mirimu gy'obukulembeze.
answer_c: Okutegeera omutendera gw'obwennyamivu mu kusalawo kw'ebya'obufuzi
answer_d: Akkiriza obuyinza bw’omuntu okuba omutuuze w’eggwanga nga asinzira ku butonde bw’amateeka.

question: Omusomesa w'ebyefirosoofa ategekatega omusomo ku ndowooza y'embeera y'obutonde ng'okusinziira ku ndowooza za J. Locke, T. Hobbes, ne J.J. Rousseau, era ekigendererwa ky'enteekateeka eno kye kino: "Okutabula enjawulo mu njigiriza zino n'obuntu obw'omuntu obw'obutonde (omweeru, ow'amagezi, era ow'omukwano)." Ku mirimu gino omusomesa gy'ateese, guli ki ogugenda okusobozesa abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'omusomo guno?
answer_a: Abayizi banoonyereza ku ndowooza y'embeera y'obutonde mu buli muwandiisi era ne bawa omusomesa alipoota ku bye bazudde.
answer_b: Abayizi bakebera omukwano oguli wakati w'endowooza y'Abangereza ey'okukebera ebintu n'embeera y'obutonde nga basinziira ku ndowooza y'omuntu.
answer_c: Abayizi bakuŋŋaanya amawulire agakwata ku mbeera ez'obutonde omuntu gy'alina ne bagawandiika mu buwandiike bwabwe.
answer_d: Abayizi basoma ekiwandiiko ekikwata ku ndowooza z'omuwandiisi buli omu ku mbeera y'obutonde era ne bategeera enjawulo n'obufaananyi bwabyo.

question: Omusomesa akolera wamu n'abayizi abakulu mu siniya ku nkola y'ebyobufuzi eya J.J. Rousseau, ng'asinga kwetikka ku ndowooza y'obwagazi obugazi, eyakozesebwa omufirosoofa Omufalansa mu kitabo kye The Social Contract (1762). Ku ngeri zino wammanga, engeri ki esinga okukakasa obulungi endowooza y'obwagazi obugazi eri abayizi bano?
answer_a: Okulonda abakulembeze b'ekibiina nga bakozesa akalulu akangi obuwanguzi.
answer_b: Okutabika kw'abayizi bonna ab'essomero n'abakozi abasomesa okutuuka ku ndagaano.
answer_c: Okusaba okwongera amaanyi mu by'okusoma mu kibiina, newankubadde nga waliwo abayizi abatakyetaaga.
answer_d: Okukkaanya wakati w'abayizi abalina endowooza ezitabanguka okutuuka ku ndagaano mu kibinja ky'ekibiina.

question: Soma omusango guno: Mu kibiina ku nkola ya Plato ey'ebirowoozo, pulofeesa annyonnyola engeri enkulu ez'ebirowoozo bya Platonic, omuli nti 'buli kirowoozo kya njawulo, nga kikiikirira ekikulu ku kiti ky'ebintu'. Omuyizi, ng'abuusabuusa ekigambo kino, addamu nti kino tekisobola kuba bwe kityo era awa ekyokulabirako nti ekirowoozo kireebwa abantu babiri, embeera ekontana n'obumu bw'ekirowoozo obuteeberezebwa. Nga twejjukanya enkola ya Plato ey'ebirowoozo, kiki ku bino wammanga ekiraga ensobi y'omuyizi?
answer_a: Omuyizi alowooza nti ebirowoozo biva mu kwogera n'abalala.
answer_b: Omuyizi ategeera nti ebirowoozo biva mu bwongo.
answer_c: Omuyizi alowooza nti endowooza za buli muntu za njawulo.
answer_d: Omuyizi alowooza nti ebirowoozo bitundu bya nsi etegeerekeka.

question: Mu kibiina kya Siniya ekya waggulu ekisoma Ebyafaayo by'Amagezi, omusomesa n'abayizi be bakolera ku nzikiriza z'eby'amagezi eza R. Descartes. Mu bigambo bino ebiri wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n'obuzibu abayizi bwe bayinza okusisinkana, obukwata ku kutegeera omulamwa "Ndirowooza, kale ndi"?
answer_a: Fumiikiriza okubaawo kw'endowooza ya Descartes ey'okuba nti "ndowooza, kale ndiwo" (Cartesian cogito)
answer_b: Okubeerawo okukwataganye n'okukozesa okubuusabuusa okw'entegeera.
answer_c: Tegeereza nti obubaawo bukwatagana n’omulimu gw’endowooza.
answer_d: Laga engeri obubaawo bwa "res cogitans" gye bukwaatagana n'obubaawo bwa "res extensa"

question: Omusomesa annyonnyola abayizi be abali mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya, engeri okumanya kw’obwongo gye kukolamu. Mu bintu bino ebikulu, kiki abayizi kye balina okuba nga baamaze okukimanya okusobola okutegeera endowooza?
answer_a: Obumanyirivu
answer_b: Okuwulira
answer_c: Ekituufu
answer_d: Okussa omwoyo

question: Mu kitundu ky’Essomero Ekkati: Empisa mu Byobufuzi, omusomesa agenda okukolera ku bigambo ebyayogerwa T. Hobbes: "homo homini lupus". Mu bintu bino wammanga, kiki abayizi kye balina okuba nga bamanyi okusobola okutegeera ebyo ebyogeddwa?
answer_a: Etteeka lye ly'efuga
answer_b: Endagaano y'obuntu bulamu
answer_c: Obutaka bw’omuntu kinnoomu
answer_d: Embeera y'obutonde

question: Omusomesa wa siniya ali mu kuteekateeka essomo ku nkola ya Kant ku ngeri gye tusobola okufunamu okumanya; okukola kino, alina okumanya ebintu abayizi bye bamaze okuyiga ebyetaagisa okusobola okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkola eyo. Kiki omusomesa ky’alina okukiraba nti abayizi bakimanyi okusobola okutandika okuyiga ku nkola eyo?
answer_a: Tegeera endowooza za D. Hume ne J. Locke ng’ezisoose okuteekateeka endowooza ya I. Kant.
answer_b: Tegeera endowooza y'Abangereza ey'obukakafu n'eyokugezesa ng'emigendo egyakulembera ekirowoozo kya Kant
answer_c: Londa endowooza z'ebiseera n'obwengula ng'enkola y'ebirowoozo ekyetaagisa okumanya, okusinziira ku I. Kant
answer_d: Tegeera endowooza z’ekintu ekirabika (phenomenon) n’ekintu ekitera kulabika (noumenon) ng’obunnyonnyofu bwa Kant ku ekyo ekisobola okumanyika.

question: Mu mutindo gw'okukebera ku birowoozo bya Plato ebikulu, omusomesa wa Filosofia alina ekigendererwa ky'okukebera kino: "Okutegeera omulamwa gw'okwetaba kw'ebintu mu Plato". Kiraga ki ekikwatagana n'ekigendererwa ekyo waggulu?
answer_a: Enjawulo eri wakati w'endowooza ya "episteme" ne "doxa"
answer_b: Tegeka endowooza za Platonic okusinziira ku mutindo gw'obutuukirivu bwazo.
answer_c: Londa engeri ssatu ez'emyoyo eziri mu lugero olw'eggaali.
answer_d: Enjawulo eri wakati w'ensi ey'obutebenkevu n'ensi ey'amagezi.

question: Omusomesa asoma mu kibiina n'abayizi be ebitundu bibiri ebisooka eby'okufumiitiriza okwa R. Descartes ng'alina ekigendererwa ky'okukolera ku kiruubirirwa kino: 'Okumanya n'okwekenneenya endowooza y'omulembe omupya eya R. Descartes.' Ku mirimu gino wammanga, gumu ku gyo gwe gunaawa obukakafu obulaga nti ekiruubirirwa kituukiddwako?
answer_a: Bannyonnyola ensonga ennamu ezireeteddwa mu birowoozo ebibiri ebisooka ebya R. Descartes ebikwata ku metafizika.
answer_b: Banoonereza ku nteekateeka ya Katisiya ku by'ekibalangulo eyalagulwa mu birowoozo bya R. Descartes ebibiri ebisooka ebikwata ku metafizika
answer_c: Balaga enkaayana ya Descartes ey’okubuusabuusa okw’amaanyi eyolekeddwa mu birowoozo bye ebibiri ebisooka ebya metaphysical ebya R. Descartes
answer_d: Bategeera endowooza ya Descartes ku nkola y’obwongo ku byo tumanyirira okuyita mu birowoozo bye ebibiri ebisooka ebya metaphysical meditations.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekya S.6, ku nkomerero y’essomo erikwata ku Bizibu bya Metaphysics ne Epistemology, ateekateeka okukebera ekigendererwa kino: 'Okutegeera enjawulo mu epistemology wakati w’empiricism ne rationalism.' Kiki abayizi kye bayinza okukola omusomesa alyoke asobole okukebera ekigendererwa ekyatuukiriziddwa?
answer_a: Teekawo akatebe akalimu endowooza ezisinga okufaanagana wakati w'enkalala zombi.
answer_b: Laga olukalala lw'endowooza enkulu eza J. Locke ne R. Descartes.
answer_c: Laga mu kifaananyi ensibuko z'okumanya okw'ekigambululo n'okw'obutebenkevu.
answer_d: Tegeka ebigambo eby'enjawulo okusinziira ku kika ky'okumanya okusinziira ku D. Hume ne J. Locke.

question: Soma embeera eno: Ku nkomerero y’essomo eriri ku “Okukulaakulana kw’Ababurugwaasi”, ekimu ku bigendererwa omusomesa bye yekebejja kwali kutegeera empisa z’Ababurugwaasi mu kyasa ekya 19. Okukola kino, abayizi baasabwa okuteekateeka lipooti ewandiike. Ku biraga ebiri wammanga, kiruwa ekisaanye okukebejjebwa okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyogeddwa?
answer_a: Ennyonnyola abagagga ng’omuzannyi omukulu mu byobufuzi mu nkyukakyuka ezaabaddewo mu kyasa ekya 19.
answer_b: Laga obulamu bw’abakungu, endowooza yaabwe ku muntu kinnoomu, n’endowooza y’obulamu obw’ekyama.
answer_c: Okwekenneenya ensibuko ezikwata ku ngeri abagagga n'endowooza yaabwe ey'obuteegera gye byeenyigira mu nkulaakulana n'okutereeza enkola y'obufuzi mu kyasa ekya 19.
answer_d: Gerageranya emirimu gy’ebyenfuna egyakolebwa abagagga mu kyasa ekya 19 eky’ekkumi n’omwenda, ng’olaga enkyukakyuka n’ebitakyukanga okutuuka leero.

question: Omusomesa ayagala okukebera ng'ayita mu kuwandiika okukola abayizi be okulaba oba bategeera ebyavaamu Ennaku Enzimbe okuggwaawo. Ku mirimu egisabiddwa wammanga, kiruwa ekikebera ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Kyogere ku nkyukakyuka mu byobufuzi ezaateekebwawo Gavumenti ya Glasnost mu USSR ng’emu ku nsonga eziviiriddeko Ennaku Enzimbe okuggwaawo.
answer_b: Ggavumenti za Reagan ne Gorbachev zaakola ki okukomekkereza olutalo olw'ebbanga?
answer_c: Lagawo engeri emu empanvu n'enjawulo emu wakati w'engeri bbiri ez'ebyafaayo ezikozesebwa okwogera ku nkomerero y'olutalo olw'ebbanga.
answer_d: Okugabana kw'amaanyi mu byobufuzi n'ensi yonna kwali kuteebwa kutya oluvannyuma lw'olutalo olw'ebbanga?

question: Omusomesa agenda kutandika omutwe ogugamba ku 'Enkola z'ebyenfuna n'engeri gye zikosaamu ekitundu', ng'alina ekigendererwa ky'okuleetera abayizi be aba siniya okwekenneenya enkyukakyuka ebibadde mu kifo eky'obuwangwa olw'enkolagana wakati w'ebyenfuna, abantu, n'enkola z'ebifo. N'olwekyo, asazeewo okutandika essomo ng'ajjukiza amakulu g'ekigambo ekifo eky'obuwangwa, ng'ayitira mu kubuuza abayizi mu bibinja. Mu by'abayizi bye baddamu, ebyalaga ekifo eky'obuwangwa ng'ekintu eky'omubiri oba eky'obutonde kyokka byasinga, nga bagamba nti kintu ekitali kyangu kukyuka mu bbanga eritali limpanvu nnyo. Nga tutunuulidde emisingi gy'obuyigiriza egikulembera okusomesa geography, kiki ku gyo ekikulu okukozesa okugaziya endowooza y'ekifo abayizi bano gye balina?
answer_a: Omukwanaganyo
answer_b: Ekifo
answer_c: Okukwatagana
answer_d: Obuvaaviirizi

question: Mu mulamwa gw'ekibiina mu kitundu 'Okuzimba kw'Amawanga mu Bulaaya ne Amerika' okwogera kuno kuteereddwawo: Omusomesa: Ani ayinza okunnyonnyola enjawulo wakati w'Eggwanga ne leesiyaani? Omuyizi 1: Eggwanga teriterera kuteeka Eggwanga era eggwanga liyinza okugabanyizibwa mu Mawanga agasukka mu limu. Omuyizi 2: Litya? Ssitegeera ky'ayogedde. Oluvannyuma, omusomesa asalawo nti ekibiina ekiddako kiritandika nga aleeta ekyokulabirako ekisomesa ekinnyonnyola eky'omuyizi asooka. Mu ngeri ki omulimu oguleeteddwa ogunnyonnyola obulungi enkolagana wakati w'endowooza z'Eggwanga ne leesiyaani?
answer_a: Laba maapu eno era onyonyole ebikulu by'eraga ku by'obuzimbe bw'ensi.
answer_b: Soma mapu y'omulamwa eno wammanga ogigeregeranye n'omulamwa gw'eggwanga.
answer_c: Laba olupapula oluliko ebifaananyi olulaga waggulu, era onnyonnyole mu bigambo byo obubaka bwe bulimu.
answer_d: Soma amakulu agaddirira era ogerageranye endowooza zombi.

question: Kiri ku bikolwa bino wammanga kye kiyinza okusobozesa abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'okubiri okwolesa okutegeera kwabwe ku ngeri y'obulamu ey'okutambulatambula n'ey'okubeera mu kifo kimu nga tukozesa eky'okulabirako ky'abantu ba Chonos, abantu ab'omu Chile?
answer_a: Gambawala ze Chonos ze baakolanga okutambulirako zaali zitya?
answer_b: Londa Abachono ku maapu eraga ebifo ebiri mu Chile.
answer_c: Gambawola Abachono bafunanga batya emmere yaabwe
answer_d: Loba abakiise b'abantu ba Chonos mu mbeera y'obuntu bwabwe ey'enjawulo.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ekisookerwako, mu somo erigenderera "Okunnyonnyola embeera y'obuntu bw'ensi ey'obuwangwa bw'Abaruumi", asaba abayizi okuwandiika olulimi lw'olugendo okuyita mu kitundu ky'ekizinga kya Italy, we balina okusisinkana ebintu by'ettaka n'endabika y'ebifo bye balambula, nga bakozesa ebigambo by'ebyobuntu bw'ensi bye bayize. Okukola omulimu guno, abayizi, nga bayambibwako omusomesa, bateekawo oluguudo lw'olugendo era ne bakisiiga ku maapu, nga balonda ebibuga by'Abaruumi bye banaayitiramu, nga bakozesa amawulire okuva mu nsonda ez'enjawulo okuteekawo engeri z'ebyobuntu bw'ensi ez'ebitundu byonna. Ku biragiro bino wammanga, kiruwa ekisaana okukozesebwa okukebera obukugu bw'abayizi okukwatagana n'ekigendererwa ky'omulimu ogwakoleddwa?
answer_a: Banuunye ebitundu obuwangwa bwa Rooma mwe bwakulira mu butuufu.
answer_b: Balaga enkulaakulana enkulu ez’obuwangwa bwa Rooma mu lugendo oluteereddwawo
answer_c: Bannyonnyola ebipimo ebikulu ebikola obutonde bw’ensi obulabika ku maapu y’ekkubo.
answer_d: Baawula empisa ez’enjawulo okuva mu bitundu by’ensi omwatandiikirwa obuwangwa bwa Rooma.

question: Omusomesa ategeka okukwasaganya ekigendererwa kino ekikulu eky’Obutonde bw’Ebyenfuna n’Embeera z’Abantu: 'Okutegeera emirimu egikolebwa abantu b’omu maka gaabwe n’ebyalo byabwe n’omugaso gwabyo eri obulamu obwa bonna.' Bubonero ki obusinga okusaana okukulaakulanya ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Tambula mu katale akali okumpi era osabe abaana bagule ebibala n'enva bwe muba mutambula.
answer_b: Tegekka enteekateeka ey'omuzadde okukyala, ajje annyonnyole engeri ekitundu mwe tuli gye kyatandika n'engeri gye kikyuseemu okumala ebbanga.
answer_c: Mugende mu maduuka agali okumpi nammwe era musabe abaana babuulire abantu abakolerayo nga mwekwatiridde ebibuuzo bye mwategeka.
answer_d: Tambula okwetooloola ebbali w’essomero era mu bifo ebimu, saba abaana okusiiga ebifaananyi by’abantu ababawunyisa.

question: Omusomesa, ng’ali mu kasenge k’abasomesa ng’ateekateeka omutwe "Okuttomeragana kw’Ensi Ebbiri", afuna ekirowoozo okuva eri munne okukozesa omukolo gwe yakozesa obulungi omwaka oguwedde okunyweza omulimu n’ebikozesebwa. Omukolo oguteereddwawo gwe guno: 1. Soma ebiwandiiko bino: Castile yali emaze okuwangula obwakabaka bwa Granada, ekigo ekisembayo eky’Obusiraamu mu Peninsula, ng’eyambibwako aba Aragonese, era nga yali mu mbeera ey’okugaziya eggwanga, nga kino kiragibwa obuwanguzi obwo. Ennumba z’olutalo oluwanvu ku Granada zaayambako, mu bintu ebirala, okutereeza amagezi g’eby’amagye era ne zireetawo obupya obw’amaanyi mu byo. Ate era, obukugu mu by’okuvuga amaato bwali butereezeddwa nnyo mu kyasa ekkumi n’ettaano, era Castile yasobola okufuuka, mu kiseera kya Trastámara, amaanyi amakulu ag’eby’ennyanja n’eby’obusuubuzi mu nguudo za Atlantic ne Mediterranean. Spain okuva mu kyasa eky’ekkumi n’essatu okutuuka mu ky’ekkumi n’ettaano: Enkyukakyuka z’Obufuzi bw’Abafuzi ab’omu Ngulu, Francisco Javier Fernández 2. Nnyonnyola, nga wasinziira ku biwandiiko, mbeera ki ezaaliwo mu byobufuzi, eby’enfuna, n’eby’obukugu mu Spain ezaayambako okugaziya eggwanga. Nga olowooza nti ebintu bino wammanga bye bisobozi by’okwekenneenya n’okukozesa ebikozesebwa ebirondoolwa mu nteekateeka y’omusomesa, kiki ku byo ekyandiyambiddwa omukolo oguteereddwawo?
answer_a: Teekawo birowoozo nga osinziira ku bukakafu.
answer_b: Londa endowooza y'omuwandiisi ku byafaayo.
answer_c: Obuufu bw'ekibuuzo obutandise
answer_d: Teekawo omutindo gw'amakulu g'ebyo ebikutegeezeddwa.

question: Omusomesa, mu kitundu "Obwetwaze bwa Chile", akola enteekateeka eno: Ekigendererwa ky'okuyiga: Okunnyonnyola engeri obwetwaze bwa Chile gye bwakulakulanaamu, ng'otunuulira abantu n'ebibiina ebyayambana, abasajja n'abakazi ab'amaanyi, okugenda mu maaso n'okuddirira kw'ensonga z'eggwanga, n'ebimu ku bintu eby'amaanyi ebyaliwo. Ekigendererwa ky'ekibiina: Okwawula engeri abagwira n'abafuzi bwe baali balabaamu ku nsonga y'okweggyako obufuzi. Obukugu bw'okulowooza obukuzibwa: Okulowooza enkalakalira. Ku bikolwa ebiyinza okubaawo wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n'ebigendererwa by'ekibiina era ekisobola okuteekebwa mu nteekateeka?
answer_a: Maliriza omutemwa ogw'ebifaananyi ng'olaga ebiseera by'Obwetwaze.
answer_b: Zimba olubaawo lw'empapula oluliko ebifaananyi n'ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku bazira b'Obwetwaze.
answer_c: Njagaliza okubategeeza nti sisobola kukola ekyo kye munsuubira. Ndi muyambi wa bya bigambo era sisobola kukola bifaananyi.
answer_d: Kola vidiyo ya ddakiika bbiri ng'ozzaawo ekimu ku bintu ebyaliwo mu kiseera ky'Obwetwaze.

question: Ku ntandikwa y’essomo eriri ku “Okusattulukuka kw’obufuzi bw’abantu n’ekiseera ky’obufuzi bw’ekinnakyemalira”, omusomesa asaba abayizi be ab’ekibiina eky’omukaaga okukolera mu bibinja okukola olukalala lw’ebintu ebyaliwo eby’enjawulo bye bawulidde ebyakola ebyafaayo bya Chile okuva mu 1970 okutuuka mu 1990. Bw’aba ng’alondoola omulimu gwabwe, akiraba nti omu ku bayizi akakasa nnyo banne b’asoma nabo: “Kale, naye ate, ani avunaanyizibwa ku coup d’état ey’amagye?” Nga twetegereza ekibuuzo ky’omuyizi, buzibu ki mu kuyiga ebifaayo ekiyinza okusuubirwa?
answer_a: Okukoma ku ndowooza ennyonnyola ebintu ebibaawo mu bbanga ettono
answer_b: Okukugira okwekenneenya ensonga okuva mu ndaba y'ebiseera ebiriwo
answer_c: Obutabaawo busobozi bwonna bwa kumanya nsonga ez’ebyafaayo okuyita ku by’obufuzi byokka
answer_d: Obutamanya nsonga ez'enjawulo ezireetawo ebyafaayo.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky'omusanvu, mu mutwe "Empendulo z'abantu ab'edda ezaayambako okutondawo obuwangwa bw'Obugwanjuba", yakubye essomo nga alina ekigendererwa eky'okunnyonnyola engeri Ennyanja ya Meditereniyaani gy'ekoleramu ng'ekifo omutambuzibwa ebintu n'okukyusa ebintu, ng'alina ekigendererwa eky'okukulaakulanya obukugu bw'okulowooza ku by'obusuubuzi, obukwatagana n'okutegeera engeri ebintu gye byeyazizzaamu n'engeri gye bitegekeddwamu nga bikwatagana n'eby'obutonde bw'ensi. Nga tutunuulidde enteekateeka y'essomo, ku mirimu gino wammanga gy'olina okuteesa okumanya oba abayizi batuuse ku bigendererwa ebyali biteereddwawo?
answer_a: Lagaalira ebifo n'engeri y'endabika y'Ennyanja Meditereniya nga ok пользуясь maapu y'ebyobufuzi ey'omulembe guno
answer_b: Nnyonnyola amakubo g'empuliziganya agaakolebwa okwetooloola Ennyanja Meditereniya nga weekozesa maapu y'ebyafaayo
answer_c: Lagaanye engeri ebintu eby'obutonde eby'enjawulo eby'omu kitundu kya Mediterranean bwe bikwatagana nga ok пользуясь maapu eraga ebintu eby'obutonde.
answer_d: Laga ebyafaayo ebikulu ebikwata ku mbeera y'obudde bw'Ennyanja Meditereniya ng'oyita mu kukola maapu y'ebirowoozo.

question:
Omusomesa ateekateeka essomo ly'ekitundu "Enjawulo y'ebifo mu Chile: ebintu ebikulu ebirabika n'obugagga obw'ebifo eby'obutonde eby'enjawulo mu ggwanga", nga ligendereddwamu okusobozesa abayizi be ab'ekibiina ekya 5 okumanya ebifo bya Chile ebikulu eby'obutonde n'endabika yaabyo, nga batunuulira we bisangibwa. Ku lw'ekyo, beetaaga okuteekateeka omulimu oguggalawo ogunaabasobozesa okukakasa oba ekigendererwa kituukiddwaako.

Ku mirimu egiddako, gumu ku gino gwe gunaaba omutuufu okugera ekigendererwa ekyateereddwawo ku lw'essomo eryo?
answer_a: Teeka maapu eraga ebitundu bya Chile eby'obutonde, ng'okozesa akabonero akagunjire.
answer_b: Gerageranya ebitundu bya Chile eby'obutonde nga ok пользуясь ebifaananyi n' map ez'enjawulo
answer_c: Londa ebifo by'abalambuzi eby'enjawulo mu buli kitundu kya Chile ng'okozesa enkola ya 'geographic coordinate system'.
answer_d: Laga ku maapu ebitundu by’obutonde ebya Chile by’okyayeddeko n’ab’omu maka go era obinyonnyole.

question: Omusomesa, mu kitundu “Enkola y’ebyobufuzi mu Chile”, ateekateeka essomo mw’anaakolera ku musingi gw’obukiikirizi era n’awa ebyokulabirako by’ebifo ebirondeddwa akalulu k’abantu bonna, n’ekigendererwa abayizi be aba 6 oba 7 okutegeera “Obukulu bw’okulonda kw’abantu bonna eri enteekateeka y’eddembe ly’eggwanga lya Chile”. Nga tutunuulidde ekigendererwa ky’essomo, ku biragiro bino wammanga kiki ekisaana okukozesebwa okukebera abayizi ku nkomerero y’essomo eryo?
answer_a: Balondoola abakulu b'ebyobufuzi abalondebwa okukiikirira bannansi.
answer_b: Banannyonnyola obukulu bw’abakungu okulondebwa okusalawo ku nsonga ezikwata ku bantu bonna.
answer_c: Banannyonnyola emirimu egikulu egy'abakungu abakiikirira abantu bwe bamala okulondebwa.
answer_d: Bikola eby'enjawulo ku ngeri z'okwetaba mu demokulasiya ezibaawo mu bulamu bw'abantu n'ebitundu byabwe eby'okumpi.

question: Omusomesa, bw'aba ng'atandika okwogera ku nsonga z'empisa ennungi n'embi, ayogera ku nsonga nti ekyo ekirungi eri abamu si kirungi eri abalala. Mu kwetaba ku kino, omuyizi agamba: "Bino bye bintu ebyesigamiziddwa ku ndowooza y'omuntu era mu nkomerero buli kimu kyesigamiziddwa ku ndowooza y'omuntu, y'ensonga lwaki ebintu ebimu bituufu eri abamu ate si bituufu eri abalala." Buzibu ki obusobola okukirizika mu kwetaba kw'omuyizi kuno?
answer_a: Okutegeera endowooza y’obuntu ng’ekintu ekifaanana ng’okukkiriza nti empisa zikyuka okusinziira ku muntu.
answer_b: Okukakasa obutakyuka bw'emisango gy'empisa nga tusinziira ku ndowooza z'abantu kinnoomu ezitali zimu
answer_c: Okwekenneenya ng’entandikwa y’enkulakulana y’empisa ennungi.
answer_d: Okuteebereza nti engeri emisingi gy’empisa gye gitambuliramu kyava mu bulowoozi bwaffe nga buli omu.

question: Omusomesa akolera mu kibiina ky'empisa ku ndowooza y'obulungi ya Aritootle. Asaba abayizi be okuwa ebyokulabirako by'ebikolwa oba embeera obulungi gye bulabikira. Omuyizi agamba nti "omuntu asoma ennyo alina empisa ng'omuntu azannya emipiira mingi." Mu ngeri ki omusomesa gy'ayinza okuyambamu omuyizi okulongoosa ekirowoozo kye okusobola okutegeera obulungi empisa za Aritootle?
answer_a: Omusomesa ajjukiza omuyizi emisingi gy'empisa ennungi.
answer_b: Omusomesa asaba omuyizi okunnyonnyola ky’ategeera mu mugatte ogwa zaabu.
answer_c: Omusomesa alung'amya omuyizi okujjukira nti obuntu bulamu butera okwagala ekirungi.
answer_d: Omusomesa asaba omuyizi okulowooza oba abazannyi balina obusobozi obw'omuzaaliranwa okukola omuzannyo gwe baagala.

question: Omusomesa mu ssomero lya siniya agenderera abayizi be okusobola okwawula wakati w’empisa ezeyimiriddeewo n’empisa ezisinziira ku biragiro by’abalala mu nkola z’empisa ezitali zimu. Kiki ekikolwa ekyandibadde ekisinga okutuukirawo abayizi be okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga ekyateekebwawo?
answer_a: Omusomesa akola eki chart ku lubaawo ng’alaga endowooza enkulu ez’enteekateeka y’empisa ey’obuntu eya Sartre n’enteekateeka ya Kant.
answer_b: Omusomesa akola era n’annyonnyola eri abayizi maapu y’endowooza erimu ebirowoozo by’empisa za Kantian ne hedonistic, nga yeesigamiziddwa ku nsibuko oba ebiragiro by’emitindo gy’omuntu kinnoomu.
answer_c: Omusomesa asaba abayizi okukola omukungaanyo ogulina ebirowoozo ebikulu eby'enteekateeka z'empisa eza Aristotle ne Kant, nga balowooza ku nsibuko y'amateeka eri omuntu kinnoomu.
answer_d: Omusomesa awamu n'abayizi be bakola ekiweebwa eky'okugeraageranya ekyesigamiziddwa ku bigendererwa ebiri mu nkola z'empisa eziteereddwawo abantu abagoberera essanyu n'abastoiki.

question: Omusomesa akoze omulimu mu mwaka ogw’okuna ogw’ekisulo kya waggulu ku kiruubirirwa kino: “Okusisinkana endowooza ku buzibu bw’empisa z’omulembe ogwa leero.” Obuzibu omusomesa bw’akozesezza n’abayizi kwe kunnyonnyola ensalo wakati w’ebyabonna n’ebyekinnoomu okusinziira ku ndowooza ya Arendt n’ebiragiro eby’amagezi ebirala, ng’abigatta ku nkola y’ebyuma bya tekinologiya leero. Ku nkomerero y’omulimu, kitegekeddwa okukebera obukugu bw’abayizi bwe batuuseeko. Ku bikolwa by’abayizi bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga obulungi okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa kino?
answer_a: Balaga engeri ez’enjawulo ez’ekifirosoofa n’ezitali za kifirosoofa okutegeera entikko z’ebintu ebya lukale n’eby’ekyama
answer_b: Bategeera ensonga ezikakasa endowooza yaabwe ku bwereere n’ekyama leero, nga balowooza ku biwandiiko bya bafilozofa bye twakozesezza mu kibiina.
answer_c: Bagerageranya ebirowoozo byabwe n'eby'omuyizi munnaabwe ku nsalo z'ekifo ky'abantu bonna n'eky'ekyama mu nkola y'emikutu gy'ebyemikwanira, nga balowooza ku biwandiiko bya bafilozofa bye baakozesa mu kibiina.
answer_d: Bazza bazimba eby’obufuzi ku nkola y’ekyama ku mitimbagano gy’ebyemikutu, nga bakozesa endowooza okuva mu bafilozofa ab’edda, aba kati oba ab’omulembe guno.

question: Mu mutwe gw'okukebera, omusomesa asaba abayizi be okwekenneenya omulandira gw'amateeka ag'okulowooza obulungi Descartes ge yawaayo mu "Discourse on the Method." Ku ngeri zino wammanga, ngeri ki entuufu eraga omutindo gw'omulimu ogwo era ng'ekwatagana n'ebyo ebyettanirwa okuyigibwa?
answer_a: Bagamba nti enkola eno bw’eteekateeka amateeka mu mutindo gw’obukulu, eba nsongovu.
answer_b: Balondoola ensonga esooka evaako buli kimu ku mateeka.
answer_c: Bategeera buli kimu ku mateeka agagobererwa mu nkola ya "Cartesian".
answer_d: Bannyonnyola enjawulo eriwo wakati w'amateeka gonna agafuga okulowooza okutuufu

question:
Omusomesa omukulu mu ssomero lya siniya, mu kiseera ky’akola omutwe "Chile mu makkati g’ekyasa ekya 20", asalawo okukozesa okubuuza ebizibu ng’enkola y’okukebera. Oluvannyuma lw’okulaga ebifaananyi eby’edda ebikwata ku mbeera embi ey’abantu ababeera mu bibuga, omusomesa abuuza abayizi ekibuuzo kino: "Singa okuva mu myaka gya 1930, gavumenti zaali zikubirizzaawo enkola y’obuyambi bw’abantu okukendeeza obutabanguko mu bantu, obulabirizi bw’amayumba amabi n’embeera embi ey’oku nguudo mu Santiago bisobola bitya okunnyonnyolwa?"
Ku mirimu egiddwa wano wansi, gwe gumu ogusobola okukozesebwa okusiima okuyita mu mulimu ogunnyonnyoddwa?
answer_a: Bageraageranya embeera z'obulamu ez'enjawulo ezaaliwo mu bibuga wakati mu kyasa ekya 20
answer_b: Balaga engeri y’ebifo eby’enjawulo ebyamerukamu ebyalo by’ebimenyebimenye mu makkati g’ekyasa ekya 20.
answer_c: Balaga engeri enzirukanya y'emirimu gya gavumenti gye yakosa okukulaakulana kw'ekibuga mu kitundu ky'emyaka ekisooka mu kyasa ekya 20.
answer_d: Banannyonnyola ensonga lwaki gavumenti ezikola ku bulamu bw’abantu zaakolebwa n’ensonga lwaki zaatandikibwawo mu kitundu ekisooka eky’ekyasa ekya 20.

question: Omusomesa agamba abayizi be abali mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya nti mu kitundu "Okusattulukuka kw'obufuzi obwa demokulasi", ekigendererwa kino kyakukolerwako mu bibinja: "Okwekenneenya okusattulukuka kw'obufuzi obwa demokulasi nga tuyita mu ngeri ez'enjawulo ezikireetawo". N'olwekyo, abasaba okunoonya amawulire agakwata ku kiseera ekyo mu nsibuko ez'enjawulo. Oluvannyuma, annyonnyola nti okusinziira ku mawulire ago, mu bibinja, bagenda kugabana bye banoonye n'ekibiina kyonna. Emu ku bibinja ebuuza omusomesa oba kiba kirungi okukola olulimi lw'ebiseera okuva mu 1970-1973, nga balaga ebintu eby'omugaso ebyaliwo mu byafaayo. Omusomesa, bw'amaze okuwulira, abasaba okunoonya engeri endala ey'okwanjula, kubanga omulimu oguteereddwawo tegwakubasobozesa kutuukiriza kigendererwa kye balondedde. Lwaki olulimi lw'ebiseera terutuukana n'ekigendererwa ekyateereddwawo eri abayizi?
answer_a: Kubanga kisinziira ku kunoonyereza okukwatagana n'obudde obwenkanya, mu kifo ky'okukozesa endowooza ezitali zimu.
answer_b: Kubanga kyawulawo ebifaananira ddala mu byafaayo, mu kifo ky’okuteekawo enkola y’obukulu okusinziira ku bukulu bwabyo.
answer_c: Kubanga kikendeeza okunoonyereza ku ndaba ey'oluse olugolokofu olw'ebintu ebyabaddewo, mu kifo ky'okutegeera enkola y'eby'emabega.
answer_d: Kubanga kyangu okusengeka ebintu ebyaliwo mu nnambika, mu kifo ky’okubigattika okusinziira ku njatula ez’enjawulo eziri mu nkola y’eby’afaayo.

question: Abayizi mu kibiina ekyokusatu balina okukiikirira engeri ebyafaayo by'omulembe ogwa kati gye byagenda bitondeka okusinziira ku mulembe omukulu ow'ebyafaayo Eric Hobsbawm gwe yassaawo, nga bakola olukalala lw'ebiseera. Okusobola okutuukiriza omulimu guno, omusomesa yabawadde ebiragiro bino: 'Laga ekitundu ekikiikirira "ekyasa ekya 19 ekiwanvu" n'ekitundu ekigatta "ekyasa ekya 20 ekimpi".' Kyokka, bwe yamaze okukebera ebyo abaana bye baakoze, bingi byali bikyamu, nga bwe kiragiddwa mu kyokulabirako kino: Miteeko ki egirina okugattibwa mu bayizi okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'omulimu ogwateereddwawo?
answer_a: Ekintu eky'omugaso ennyo n'embeera enzibu
answer_b: Obugendererevu n'enkyukakyuka
answer_c: Obudde obw'ebyafaayo n'obudde obuteebereza.
answer_d: Ensibuko n'ebivaamu

question: Ku nkomerero y’ekibiina ekikwata ku “Enkola y’Akatale,” omusomesa akola okukebera okw’omukutu okumanya oba abayizi be bategeera ebintu ebireetawo enkyukakyuka mu bwetaavu bw’ekintu. N’olwekyo, omusomesa abasaba okulonda okuva mu by’okulabirako ebiwerako okukozesa embeera eno ku bulamu obwa bulijjo. Mu by’okulabirako bino wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n’omukozi w’omuyizi akolerera okutuukiriza ekyo omusomesa ky’asuubira?
answer_a: José: Emyaka nga ebiri emabega, nnali nzimba caaka za chocolate ku kiyosiki ky’essomero, naye okuva etteeka lwe lyakyuka, kati nzirina okuzigula wabweru n’okuzireeta mu nsawo yange ey’omukono.
answer_b: Claudia: Wiiki ewedde twagenda ku mizannyo n'abakozi baffe, naye olw'okuba twakererewa, tetwasobola kufuna tiketi, kwe kusalawo okukozesa ssente ku pizza ne sandwiichi.
answer_c: Jacqueline: Mu luwummula olw'ekyeya, twategeka ne tupangisa ekisaawe okuzannyira omupiira gw'ebigere omulundi gumu buli wiiki, kale nneetaaga okuba ne pesos 1,200 buli wiiki.
answer_d: Ignacio: Okutuusa omwaka oguwedde, nnali nkolaasa ssente ze bampa ku byuma ebikwata ku alubaamu, naye kati olw’okuba sikyagala alubaamu, nterekera ssente ezo okuzikozesa ku kintu ekirala.

question:
Mu mutera gw'essomo "Ebitundu n'enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'ebyenfuna n'ensimbi", omusomesa agenda okwekenneenya n'abayizi be ab'omwaka ogusooka mu siniya enkola y'akatale ng'asinziira ku ngeri ebintu gye biteekebwamu ebbi. N'olwekyo, asalawo okutandika ekibiina n'omulamwa gw'obunnabbi era n'ebyokulabirako ebimu.

Nga twekenneenya embeera eno, kumanya ki abayizi kwe balina okuba nakwo okusobola okutegeera omulamwa ogutandikawo?
answer_a: Omusingi gw'ebbula ly'ebintu
answer_b: Etteeka ly'obusobozi bw'okugula
answer_c: Omulamwa gw'ebbula ly'ebbeeyi
answer_d: Omulamwa gw'okuyingiza data

question: Omusomesa, oluvannyuma lw’okumaliriza omutwe ogugamba ku “Enkola y’amateeka”, agenda kunnyonnyola kiki kye yandikoze okusobola okukakasa oba abayizi be ab’omu mwaka ogw’okuna mu siniya basobodde okutegeera emisingi egigendererwa mu mateeka. Ku bino ebikolebwa wammanga, kiki ekiyinza okumuyambako okukung’aanya obujulizi okusobola okukebera oba ekigendererwa kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Okukozesa ensibuko, nnyonnyola omulimu gw'eggwanga mu kukuuma obwetwaze bw'ettaka lyalyo.
answer_b: Laga ng'ekyokulabirako okuva mu mawulire eky'omukulu w'ekitongole kya gavumenti ng'annyonnyola ebikolwa bye.
answer_c: Enyonyola obuvunaanyizibwa bw'eggwanga okukuuma obulungi bwa bonna
answer_d: Enjawulo ku bukulu bw’okwetaba mu kulonda mu kutondawo eggwanga

question: Omusomesa ow'ekibina eky'okubiri ali ku mulembe gw'Abayonaani n'Abaruumi n'abayizi be era, ng'ekimu ku bikolebwa mu kibiina, agabanya ekibiina mu bibinja, ng'awa buli kibinja kaadi eraga ekintu ekikulu mu mirembe egyo, gamba nga: ekizannyo, amateeka, obuzimbe n'ebifaananyi, enfumo, amagezi, olulimi, n'ebirala. Buli kibinja kirina okunoonyereza ku kintu kye baweereddwa nga bakozesa ebintu omusomesa by'abawadde era balage ebintu byakyo ebikyaliwo leero n'ebitakyaliwo. Omusomesa ayinza okuba ng'asinga kwesigama ku mulamwa gwaki ogw'okuyigiriza ebyafaayo ng'akozesa omulimu guno n'abayizi be?
answer_a: Obutalekereraawo
answer_b: Obunnabulizi
answer_c: Enkyukakyuka n’enkulakulana
answer_d: Obugendererevu n'enkyukakyuka

question:
Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okusatu abadde akolera wamu n’abayizi ku mbeera ez’enjawulo ez’obulamu obwa bulijjo obw’Abayonaani ab’edda. Bwe babadde boogera ku nteekateeka y’embeera z’abantu mu byafaayo eby’edda, omuyizi agamba nti: “Abayonaani baali babi”. Omusomesa amubuuza lwaki ayogera bw’atyo, omuyizi n’amuddamu: “Kubanga baalina abaddu”.
Nsobi ki mu kunoonyereza ku byafaayo erabika mu byo omuyizi by’ayogedde?
answer_a: Akebera ebintu ebikulu mu buwangwa bw'Abayonaani ng'ayoleka obusosoze mu mawanga.
answer_b: Yeenyigira mu kukyamya engeri abantu ba Giriki gye baali batengejjerwamu n'engeri Abaruumi gye baali batengejjerwamu.
answer_c: Ateenyoomereza busiraani bw'obuwangwa bw'Abayonaani eri embeera z'abantu ez'omulembe guno
answer_d: Amuwandiikira ebintu eby'omugaso mu byafaayo by'Abayonaani ng'akozesa ebipimo ebiriwo kati.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekinaana akuŋŋaanya abayizi mu bibinja n’abasaba okunoonya amawulire ku yintaneeti agakwata ku butonde bw’ensi obusangibwa mu Chile. Oluvannyuma, abasaba okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw’obutonde obwo, ekyandibaddewo singa bubula, n’engeri gye tuyinza okubukuuma leero. Mu nkomerero, buli kibinja kirina okwanjula ebyo bye bazuulidde mu maaso g’ekibiina. Kitiisa ki omusomesa ky’asinga okugenderera okukulaakulanya okuyita mu mulimu ogwo waggulu?
answer_a: Okubuuliriza
answer_b: Okulowooza okukwata ku bwagaagavu
answer_c: Okukozesa obubaka obw'ebifo ebitali bimu (Sources)
answer_d: Okulowooza okw'amagezi

question: Omusomesa ow’ekika kya ‘kindergarten’ agenda okukebera ekigendererwa kino ekikulu eky’okuyiga okumanya embeera z’abantu n’ennono zaabwe: “Okunoonyereza ku bikozesebwa mu nnyumba n’ebyuma bya tekinologiya ebiri mu bulamu obwa bulijjo, gamba nga: ebibya, ebintu omuterekebwa amazzi, emyeezo, ebijiko, amasimu, n’ebirala, ng’abikozesa buli lunaku mu mbeera ezitali zimu ne mu mizannyo.” Kiki omwana ky’alaga ekiraga nti atuukirizza ekigendererwa kino eky’okuyiga?
answer_a: Yogera amannya g'ebintu eby'omulembe nga essimu n'essaawa.
answer_b: Kozesa ebintu ebikozesebwa mu nnyumba, gamba ng’ekikopo n’akajiiko, okuzannya ng’olya.
answer_c: Kukwata, okukozesa n'okukuba ebivuga nga okukozesa ebintu ebiri mu nnyumba, gamba nga bbakuli n'ebijiiko.
answer_d: Tegeka ebintu bya tekinologiya, gamba nga essimu entono n’essimu enkulu, mu kifo ekituufu eky’okuzannyira.

question: Mu kibiina kya ‘kindergarten’, omusomesa agenda kukozesa empapula z’okwetegereza ng’ekyakukozesebwa okukebera okuyiga kw’abaana abato okusinziira ku biragiro bino ebikwata ku mutima gw’okutegeera embeera z’obuwangwa n’obulamu: Anyumya ku bikolwa eby’omumulembe mu kitundu kyabwe. Annyonnyola engeri gy’etabamu mu bikolwa eby’omumulembe mu kitundu kyabwe. Kiki ekiyigirizibwa ekiyinza okukozesebwa okwetegereza okukakasa ebyo abaana bye batuuseeko okukwatagana n’ebiragiro ebyo?
answer_a: Loboza ebikolwa ebibaawo mu kitundu ky'ebyenjigiriza.
answer_b: Mubu mwe muli okwaniriza, baagala okumanya kye mwakola ku wiikendi.
answer_c: Nga mukuŋŋaanidde mu bubinja obutono, mukoppe ebikolwa bya bulijjo bye mukola awaka.
answer_d: Mu bibinja, mukubaganye ebirowoozo ku mirimu ab'omu maka gye bakola mu mikolo gy'amasanyu.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina ekyokusatu mu kukebera okw’okubumbulukusa akizuula nti newankubadde abayizi be bakuguse mu kutegeera ebyo basoma, balina obuzibu mu kuwanika n’okuwakanya endowooza zaabwe. Ng’asinziira ku mbeera eno, omusomesa agenda kuteekateeka omulimu ogugenda okusobozesa abayizi okutereeza engeri gye bakolamu. Ku mirimu egiddwa wano wansi, mulimu ki ogwandibadde omutuufu okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Omusomesa akola, awamu n'abayizi be, akatabo akalimu ebika by'okulambulula ebirowoozo eby'enjawulo, engeeranyo, n'obulimba, ng'abannyonnyola engeri gye balina okukozesaamu ebintu bino mu kuwandiika kwabwe.
answer_b: Omusomesa akola ebibinja by’okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikwata ku nkola ya Firosoofa ng’ekikolwa eky’okulambika ebirowoozo. Oluvannyuma, abayizi balina okukola okulambika kwabwe nga boogera ku ngeri gye balaba ensonga eyo.
answer_c: Omusomesa asaba abayizi okunoonya amawulire ag’empaka ku mukutu gwa intaneeti oluvannyuma bakole eby’okulwanirira ensonga nga bagoberera enteekateeka ebaweereddwa mu katabo akabayigiriza.
answer_d: Omusomesa alagira abayizi okusoma “ebbaluwa eri omukungu w’ekitabo ky’amawulire” era bagattulule ensonga ezirimu. Oluvannyuma, balina okukola ebbaluwa yaabwe eri omukungu w’ekitabo ky’amawulire, nga bawa ensonga zaabwe ku nsonga eyo.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ekyokuna mu ssomero lya secondary ali mu kusomesa essomo ly’Empisa z’Abantu. Ebigendererwa by’ekibiina kino kwe kusobozesa abayizi okutegeera engeri z’obufuzi ez’enjawulo ezaateekebwawo edda. Okutuukiriza kino, abawa ebitundu okuva mu kitabo kya Plato ekiyitibwa Republic n’abasuubira okuggyamu n’okunnyonnyola engeri z’obufuzi ezirambikiddwaamu. Mu kiseera kino, ekibinja ky’abayizi kinyumya ku nsonga eno: singa demokulasi kati etwalibwa ng’emu ku ngeri z’obufuzi ezisinga obulungi, lwaki Plato aginnyonnyola ng’engeri y’obufuzi eyonoonefu? Oluvannyuma basaba omusomesa okubayamba okugonjoola ekizibu ekyo. Okusinziira ku mbeera eyo waggulu, kuyambagana kwa ngeri ki omusomesa kw’asaanidde okukozesa okuluŋŋamya abayizi n’okugonjoola ekibuuzo kyabwe?
answer_a: Abagamba okugeraageranya gavumenti ey'ekinnakyemalira ku demokulasiya, okwekenneenya enjawulo, ate oluvannyuma bakozese ekibalangulo kya Plato.
answer_b: Akolera ku bibuuzo by'abayizi ng'omukisa okwetegereza ennyo endowooza ya Plato ku gavumenti ennungamu era agigeraageranya n'engeri za gavumenti eziriwo kati.
answer_c: Annyonnyola nti gavumenti ez’omulembe guno tezisobola kutuukiriza bulungi ngeri Plato gye yannyonnyola gavumenti olw’obuzibu obungi obuli mu nkola yazo ennaku zino.
answer_d: Abagamba okuddamu okusoma amakulu ga Plato ku demokulasiya, oluvannyuma, wamu nabo, akola okugeraageranya wakati w’eki Plato kye yateesa n’amakulu ga demokulasiya aga kati.

question: Omusomesa ateekateeka omutendera gw'empisa mu kibiina ky'akamalirizo mu ssomero lya siniya era mu musomo oguddako agenda kwogera ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okukulaakulanya endowooza z'omuntu ku butonde bw'omuntu, okuzimba obuggya n'okubuusabuusa emisingi gy'abawandiisi abamu." Mu kitundu ekisooka eky'ekibiina, omusomesa agenda okunnyonnyola abayizi endowooza z'abantu ezannyonnyolwa Hobbes ne Rousseau era ateekateeka omukolo oguddako ogusobozesa abayizi okwenyigira mu byo ebiri mu mutendera guno n'okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa. Ku mikolo gino wammanga, gumu ku gyo gwe gwandibadde omuganyulo eri abayizi okukola ku kiruubirirwa ekyogeddwa?
answer_a: Abayizi bawaayo olwogerero mu maaso g'abayizi bannaabwe nga balaga ebyokulabirako ebya bulijjo ebikwata ku ndowooza z'abantu mu mbeera ey'obutonde ng'okusinziira ku Hobbes ne Rousseau.
answer_b: Abayizi bakola omuzannyo ogw'okugeraageranya nga balina okusalawo oba bakole nga Hobbes bwe yalowooza oba nga Rousseau bwe yalowooza okusobola okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa.
answer_c: Abayizi bakuba olukiiko olwetoloolevu nga beekubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'okunyaga amaduuka amanene, nga basinziira ku musingi gw'enzikiriza y'ebyafaayo by'abantu ogwa Hobbes ne Rousseau.
answer_d: Abayizi baleetawo ekizibu eky’empisa ekikwaatagana n’okukwata ekifo ku lw’abakozi oba omukama, nga basiima ku musingi gw’ebyobufuzi ogwa Hobbes ne Rousseau.

question: Omusomesa alambalambula ebitundu eby'enjawulo okuva mu biwandiiko bya bafilozofa n'abayizi abali mu S.6, omuli Nietzsche ne Sartre. Omuyizi abuuza oba nga waliwo akakwate konna wakati w'ekigambo kya Nietzsche: “Katonda afudde” n'okutya okw'amaanyi okw'obulamu okusinziira ku Sartre. Mu by'okuddamu bino wammanga, kiki ekyinza okutangaaza okubuusabuusa kw'omuyizi n'olulimi olugazi n'obumalirivu obw'omwoyo?
answer_a: Yee, waliwo akakwate, okuva nga endowooza ya Sartre esibuka ku ebyo abafirosoofa nga Nietzsche bye baali baamaze okutegeeza.
answer_b: Yee, waliwo akakwate, kubanga byombi bikwatagana n’endowooza z’ebyefirosoofi eziwakanya ebyo abantu bye babadde balowooza nga bituufu.
answer_c: Yee, waliwo akakwate, kubanga ebigambo “Katonda afudde” n’okutya okw’amaanyi byombi byoleka obwetwaze bw’abantu oba eddembe lyabwe mu mpisa nga bwe balina okusalawo n’okukola ekituufu oba ekikyamu mu ngeri etagoberera Katonda.
answer_d: Yee, bikwatagana, okuva abawandiisi bombi balowooza ku mbeera y'omuntu mu maaso g'obulamu, n'obulabe obutaliiwo n'obunafu bw'obulagirizi bw'empisa okuluŋŋamya ekikolwa ky'omuntu, ekifuuka eky'akubagiza awatali mitindo gya Katonda oba eby'ekigendererwa.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna mu siniya asomesezza ku kunenyeza kwa Kant okw’obusobozi bw’okumanya ate n’asaba abayizi be okuddamu ebibuuzo ebimu mu bbaluwa zaabwe. Bw’amaze okubyetegereza, akizuula nti abasinga obungi mu kibiina batabudde eky’okuddamu kwa Kant ku kintu eky’okumanya n’endowooza y’abamagezi abakugu. Mulimu ki ogwandibadde omutuufu abayizi okutegeera n’okwawula endowooza ya Kant?
answer_a: Abayizi bakunganya ebipimo ebikulu eby'endowooza y'abamagezi n'eya Kant, nga babiwandiika mu buwandiisi bwabwe.
answer_b: Abayizi banoonyereza ku birowoozo bya Kant ne Locke, oluvannyuma ne baleeta ebikulu bye baakola.
answer_c: Abayizi bakola okunoonyereza okugeraageranya ku birowoozo by'abamanyi ku byafaayo, abamanyi ku magezi, n'ebirowoozo bya Kant, nga bayita mu maapu eraga endowooza.
answer_d: Abayizi bakola ekibalangulo ky'ebigambo bya Kant, eby'okukakasa, n'eby'amagezi.

question: Omusomesa w’omwaka ogw’okuna mu Siniya alina enteekateeka ng’alina ekigendererwa eri abayizi be okwekenneenya n’okunnyonnyola omulamwa gwa Nietzsche ogugamba nti "tewali mazima, wabula okunnyonnyola", era ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki asazeewo okukozesa ebikozesebwa okuva mu byamawulire. Mu bintu bino wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n’ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a:
**Ebyafaayo eby'obulimba:** Eggwanga lya Uganda ligenda kuggala amasomero gonna olw'ekirwadde kya COVID-29

**Obujulizi obulaga nti si bituufu:** Minisita w'ebyenjigiriza yafulumizza ekiwandiiko n'ategeeza eggwanga lyonna nti tewali masomero gaggalwa era n'agamba nti ebyogerwa bya bulimba. Ebiwandiiko byonna ebya gavumenti biraga nti amasomero gakola nga bwe galina okukola.
answer_b: Laga ebifaananyi ebitongeddwa n'ebyennyini eby'abantu abalaga ku ttivvi.

answer_d: Laga omuwendo gw'abo abaagala n'abo abatagaala ekifaananyi ekikwata ku lukungo lw'amawulire.

question: Omusomesa yekebejjezza essomo ly'ekitundu ku epistemology mu mwaka ogwokusatu mu siniya, ng'asinga kwetikka ku nsonga za Descartes ezikwata ku butonde. Mu kwekebejja, akiraba nti abayizi abamu boogera ku nsonga ezikwata ku ndowooza y'obutuukirivu ezifaanana bweziti: "Okusinziira ku Descartes, singa abantu bonna balina endowooza y'obutuukirivu kye kitegeeza nti ffenna twali tulina okumanya ku kintu ekituukiridde, era n'olwekyo endowooza eno yateekebwa mu bwongo bwaffe. Era singa ffenna tumanyi ekintu ekituukiridde, kitegeeza nti Katonda ye yatonda ebintu bino." Ng'okwatagana n'ensonga za Descartes, buzibu ki mu nkola y'okuyiga obuyinza okuteeberezebwa okuva mu kuddamu kuno?
answer_a: Abayizi tebaasobodde kukwanaganya buziba bw'ekibuuzo kya Descartes ekikwata ku kintu ekijjuvu ekiva mu birowoozo byaffe bye tulaba.
answer_b: Abayizi tebaategeera nteekateeka ya Katisiya ku lw'ensonga y'okutuukirira ng'endowooza ey'omuzaaliranwa esibuka mu bwakalimagezi.
answer_c: Abayizi tebannyonnyodde bulungi bye baayogedde, nga batabula okunnyonnyola kwa Descartes ku nsonga y’ekiteeso kya Katonda ekiva mu butuukirivu.
answer_d: Abayizi tebaategeka bulungi ngeri y’okulambulula ebirowoozo ebiraga obubaka bwa Descartes obulaga nti Katonda gy’ali okusinziira ku ndowooza y’obutuukirivu.

question: Omusomesa w’essomero eyaakamaliriza ery’okuna ateekateeka okunnyonnyola engeri Plato gye yalowoozaamu ebyobufuzi, era olw’ensonga eno yeetaaga okukebera oba abayizi balina obumanyirivu obumala. Ndowooza ki eya Plato abayizi gye balina okumanya okusobola okutegeera obulungi engeri Plato gy’alowoozaamu ku Ggwanga?

answer_b: Obubiri bwa Platonic

answer_d: Omulamwa gw'empisa ennungi mu by'obufuzi

question:

question:

question: Omusomesa atunula mu nkulaakulana y'ebipande ebigeraageranya, ebyakolebwa abayizi b'omwaka ogw'okuna mu siniya, ku birowoozo bya Descartes ne Locke. Omulimu gwali gwakugenderera okuyamba abayizi okutegeera n'okugeraageranya ekizibu ky'okumanya mu bawandiisi bombi. Mu mulimu ogumu, kizuuliddwa nti abayizi baleese ebirowoozo ebisaana abawandiisi, naye okugeraageranya wakati waabwe tekukoleddwa. Ku magezi ag'okuyamba gano wammanga, kki ekikuyamba okumanya obulungi engeri omuntu gy'akolamu era ne kimulung'amya okutuuka ku kigendererwa?
answer_a: Ebirowoozo ebireeteddwa bituufu era birungi, naye byetaaga okwawulwamu mu bitundu eby’enjawulo okusobola okukyusaamu omulimu gwabyo.
answer_b: Amawulire agakwata ku buli muwandiisi mutuufu. Gabuzeeko okutegekebwa okusinziira ku bibuuzo oba endowooza ze bafaanagana naye nga balina eby'okuddamu n'amakulu ag'enjawulo, okusobola okukola okugeraageranya okumala.
answer_c: Mulimu mulungi. Wabula, okwongera okutereeza okugeraageranya kuno, kyetaagisa okukitereeza ennyo okusinziira ku ndowooza y'omufirosoofa buli omu gy'alina.
answer_d: Ebirowoozo bya buli muwandiisi byawuluddwa bulungi. Kati, okukola okugeraageranya okutuufu, kikulu okutegeka endowooza n'obwegendereza obusingako mu kulambulula ensonga.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa abadde akolera wamu n’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya ku mutwe "Okunyweza Eggwanga n’Enkyukakyuka mu Demokulasiya y’Abantu mu Chile mu Kitundu Ekisooka eky’Ekyasa ekya 20". Oluvannyuma abasaba okukoppa olukiiko lwa paalamenti omuli buli kibiina ekikola kirage ensonga lwaki ekibiina ky’ebyobufuzi kyandegattiddwa oba tekyandegattiddwa ku Kkubo ly’Abantu Abatutumufu. Nga twekenneereza ekitundu ekyokubiri eky’omulimu guno, ku bikolwa bino wammanga kiki ekisobola okukeberwa?
